geuga malhagil igeos-i nae ju nim-ui jabisila junim-ui yagsog-i im hayeoss-eul ttaeneun geugeos-eul meonjilo mandeul eobeolini junim-ui yagsog-eun jinlila
geunal hananim-eun geudeul seologa padowa gat-i seolo gyeogdolsikil geos-i myeo teuleompes-i ullimyeon hananim-eun geu deul-eul dasi moige halila
geuttae geunal hananim-eun bulsinjadeul-ege jiog-eul boyeojulila
ittae geudeul-ui nundeul-eun gali wojyeo naleul yeom-wonhaji moshago deudji do moshanola
bulsinjadeul-eun naega anin nauijong-eul guwonjalo chwihalyeo saeng-gaghaneunyo sillo hananim-eun bulsinjadeul-ui jugeoji losseo jiog-eul malyeonhayeossnola
illeogalodoe hananim-i neohui ege geudeul-ui haeng-wilo sonsil-i gajang keun jaleul illeojuliyo
ideul-eun geudeul-ui haneun il-i seonhaeng-ila saeng-gaghamyeonseo hyeonse-ui salm eman nolyeoghadoda
geudeul-eun junim-ui malsseumgwa junimgwaui mannam-eul bujeonghaneun jadeul-ini geudeul-ui ildeul-eun muwilo kkeutnal geos-i myeo simpan-ui nal hananim-eun geudeul-ege amuleon gachido duji anh-eulila
geugeos-i geudeul-eul wihan jiog-ui bosang-ila ineun mid-eum-eul geoyeoghago naui malsseumgwa naui seonjijadeul-eul jo longhayeossgi ttaemun-ila
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun ideul-eun gajang nop-eun cheongug-eul ga jil geos-ila
geulihayeo geugos-eseo yeongsaengha ni geudeul-eun amuleon byeonhwaleul balaji anhnola

illeogalodoe badaga junim-ui malsseum-eul giloghagi wihan ingkeula han dahaedo junim-ui malsseum-i dahagi jeon e geu badaneun malla beolil geos-imyeo man-il hananim-i bada hanaleul deohan da hayeodo geuleohalila

illeogalodoe sillo naneun neohuideulgwa ttoggat-eun han ingan-ina danji sin eun dan hanbun ppun-ilaneun gyesiga naege naelyeoss-eul ppun junim-eul mannagoja wonha neun janeun seon-eul haenghago junim-eul gyeongbae hal ttaeeneun eoneu mueosgwado biyuha ji malla hasyeossneunija
kapeu ha ya ain swadeu
igeos-eun geudae junim-ui jong jaka lia-ege bepul-eojin eunhyee gwanhan eongeub-ila
bola geuneun eunmilhi geuui ju nim-eul buleudeola
geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui ppyeodeul eun heoyaghayeojigo meolineun baegbal-i doeeossnaida jeoneun junimkke giwonhayeochugbogbadji anihan jeog-i eobs-eossseubnida
nae hue ol nae chincheogdeul-i haenghalgeos-i dulyeobnaida je anaega bul-im ioni dangsin-eulobuteo han sangsog-in-eul juobsoseo
geulihayeo jeoui daeleul isgo ya gob-ui gagyeleul isgehayeo jusigo ju yeo geuleul dangsinkkeseo manjoghasineun ja lo hayeo jusoseo
jakaliayeo hananim-i neoege adeul-ui sosig-eul julini geuui ileum eun yohan-ila geu ileum-eun eoneu nu guegedo juji anihaessdeon ileum-inila
ittae geuga malhagil juyeo jega eotteohge aileul gajil su issgessseubni kka jeoui anaeneun bul-im-imyeo jeoneun imi nosoehayeossseubnida hadeola
geubunkkeseo ileusigil geuleohge doelila neoui junim-i malsseumhasa geugeos eun naege swiun il-inila hasyeoss-eumyeo naneun imi ijeon-e jonjaechi anh-assdeon neoleul changjohaji anihaessdeonyo
geuga juyeo jege geu yejeung-euljuobsoseo lago malhani junimkkeseo ileusigil geu yejung-eulo nega geonjeon hamyeonseodo sam-ildong-an salamdeul-ege mal-eul moshalila
geulihayeo geuneun yebaedang-eseo geuui baegseong-egelo naga achim jeonyeog-eulo hananim-eul chanmihala geudeul-ege sonjis-eulo malhadeola
yohan-iyeo i seongseoleul dandanhi jikila hananim-eun geuga eolyeoss-eul ttae geuege jihyeleul jueossnola
geuligo hananim-egyeseo jaaewa-eunchong-eul bad-ass-euni geuneun gyeong-geonha-eossdeo la
geuui bumo-egedo sunjong hayeoss go ttohan geuneun geomanhajido ani ha yeoss-eumyeo omanhamdo eobs-eossnola
geuga tansaenghan nalgwa geuga imjonghaneun nalgwa geuga buhwalhaneun nal-e geu ege pyeonghwaga iss-eul geos-ila
seongseoe issneun geudaelo malia e gwanhayeo iyagihala geunyeoga ga jog-eul dugo dongjjog eoneu gos-eulo tteo nassdeon yaegiinila
geudeul-i boji ani hadolog geunyeoga eolgul-eul galiwoss-eul ttae hananim-i geu nyeoege cheonsaleul bonaeni geuneun geunyeo ap-e salangcheoleom natanassdeola
ittae geunyeoga jeoneun jabilou sin hananimkke guwonhanaida sillo dangsin-i gyeong-geonhan jalamyeon jeoleul haechi ji masoseo lago malhamae
geuga malhagil sillo naneun dang sin junim-ui sajalosseo seongseuleoun a deul-ui sosig-eul jeonhagi wihae wassnola haneo
geunyeoga malhagil eoneu namjado jeoleul jeobchoghaji anihaessgo ttohan bu jeong-eul jeojileujido ani haessneunde eo tteohge jega adeul-eul gajil su issseubni kka

ie geuga malhagil geuleohge doe lila dangsin-ui junimkkeseo geugeos-eun nae ge swiun il-ila geulohayeogeum baegseong eul wihan yejeung-i doege hago hananim ui eunhyega doedolog imi geuleohge myeong hayeojin il-ieossnola
geulihayeo geunyeoneun ingtaehago meolli tteol-eojin gos-eulo olmgyeogassdeola
chulsan-ui jintong-i simhayeo geunyeo neun jonglyeonamu julgie gidaego malha gil ijeon-e jug-eobeolyeossdamyeon joyonghi ij-eobeolil su issneun il-inde
geuttae jonglyeonamu mit-eseo cheonsa ga geunyeoleul buleudeoni seulpeohaji mal la ne junimkkeseo ne mit-e heuleuneun naesmul-eul dusyeossnola
jonglyeonamu julgileul nega issneun jjog-eulo hondeul-eola geuleomyeon jal ig-eun yeolmaega neoegelo tteol-eojilini
meoggo masieo ma-eum-eul pyeong-anke hala geuligo nega salam-eul mannageo deun jeoneun hananimkke dansighal geos-eul maengsehayeoss-eumae oneul nuguwado mal-eulhaji anh-eul geos-ila malhayeola
eolma hu geunyeoga adeul-eul angoseo salamdeul-ege natanani maliayeoneoneun isanghan geos-eul gajigo wassguna lago jolonghadeola
alon-ui nu-iyeo neoui abeoji neun nappeun salam-i anieossgo ne eomeonido bujeonghan yeojaga anieossnola
geuleoja geunyeoneun geuaeleul galeu kyeossdeola ittae moduga yolam-an-e iss neun agiwa eotteohge mal-eul halan mal-i nyo lago malhadeola
agiga malhagil naneun hananim-uijong-eulo geubunkkeseo naege seongseoleul jusigo naleul yeeonjalo taeghasyeossseubnida
jega eodie issdeon jeojeul chugbog bad-eunjalo hasyeossgo jega sal-a issneun han yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul ba chila jeoege myeonglyeonghayeossseubnida
jeoui mochin-ege hyodohala hasyeossgo jeolo hayeogeum geomanhaji anihagobulhaengham-i eobsdolog hasyeossseubnida
jega tansaenghan nalgwa jega imjong haneun nalgwa jega sal-aseo buhwalhaneun nal-e jeoege pyeonghwaga issdolog hasyeoss seubnida
geugeos-i balo maliaui adeul yesue daehan iyagilo igeos-eun geu deul-i nonjaenghaneun geos-e daehan jinliui malsseum-ila
hananimkkeseoneun adeul-eul gajil pil-yoga eobsnola geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss eusoseo geubun-i eotteon geos-eul wonhasil ttae malsseum-eul naelisini iss-eola geuleo myeon issneunila
jinsillo hananim-eun naui junim iyo neohui junim-isini geubun man-eul gyeongbaehala igeos-i gajang baleun gil-i la
geuleonde geudeul gaunde mulideul i uigyeon-eul dallihani widaehan simpan ui nal bulsinhaneun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
geudeul-i hananim-egelo oneun nal geudeul-eun bunmyeonghi deul-eul geos-imyeo ttobunmyeonghi bolila geuleona oneul-ui eo liseog-eun jadeul-eun bunmyeonghi banghwanghage doelila
geudeul-ege gotong-ui nal-eul gyeong-go hala geudeul-i mid-eum-eul geeulli hal ttaeil-eun gyeoljeongdoeeojinola
jinsillo hananim-eun daejiwa geu wie issneun modeun geos-eul sangsoghanani geudeul moduneun hananim-egelo gwiuihanola
seongseoan-e issneun abeulaham-eun jinsilhan yeeonjayeoss-eum-eul sang-gisikila
geuga geuui abeojikke wae deud jido moshago bojido moshamyeo dangsin kke hyoyongdo eobsneun geos-eul sungbaehago issseubnikka
abeoji dangsinkke ileuji moshan jisig-i jeoege ileuleossnani jeoleul ttaleusibsiyo jega abeojileul baleun gillo annaehagessseubnida
abeoji satan-eul seomgimyeon ani doebnida sillo satan-eun hananim-eul bae banhayeossseubnida
abeojiga hananim-eulobuteo beol-eul bad-a satan-ui chinguga doelkka dulyeobseubnida

ittae abeojikkeseo daedabhasa abeulaham-a neoneun neoui sindeul-eul silh eohaneunyo nega dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeonnaega neoleul dollo ttaelil geos-ila geuligo nalobuteo olaesdong-an tteol-eojyeo iss ge halila
abeulaham-i abeoji pyeong-anhasoseo abeojileul wihae junimkke yongseoleul bilgessseubnida junim-eun jeoege jabileulbepusyeossseubnida
jeoneun yeoleobundeulgwa hananim oe e yeoleobundeul-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul tteo na jeoui junimkke gido deuligessseubni da junim-e-ui jeoui gidoneun chugbog-eul bad-eul geos-ibnida
geuga hananim anin daleun geos-eulsungbaehaneun geudeul-eul beoligo tteonass-eul ttae hananim-eun geuege isaggwa yagob ol jueo geudeullo hayeo yeeonjaga doege hayeossnola
hananim-eun geudeul-ege eunhyeleul bepul-eossgo jinsil-ui mallo geudeul-eul nop yeossnola
seongseosog-e issneun daelo mose-ui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun seontaegbad-eun-yeeonjaimyeo seonjijaieossnola
hananim-eun sinai san upyeon-e seo geuleul bulleoss-eumae sinbiui yaegileul nanugi wihae hananim-eun geuleul gakka i bulleossnola
hananim-i geuui gido-e eunhye leul bepusa geuui hyeongje alon-eul yeeonjalo dueossnola
seongseosog-e issneundaelo iseuma-el-ui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun yagsog eul jikineun chungsilhan jalo yeeonjai myeo seonjija ieossnola
geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege yebae leul deuligo iseullamseleul bachil geos-eul chogguhasa junimkkeseoneun geulohayeo gippeohasyeossnola
seongseosog-ui ideuliseuui iyagileul deullyeojula geuneun jinsilhan yeeonjaieossnola
geulihayeo hananim-eun geuleul nop eun wichie dueossnola

ideul-eun adam-ui jasondeul gaunde hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepun yeeonjadeul-ila geu jung-eneun noawa hamkke bangjue oleun jaga iss-eossgo abeula hamgwa iseula-el jason-i iss-eumyeo geu jung-eneun hananim-i olh-eun gillo indo han jaga iss-eumyeo seontaeghan jaga iss-eossnola hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege gyesidoeeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun buboghago gyeongbaehayeo nunmul-eul heullyeossnola
geuleonde geudeul ihue yebaeleul geeullihago yogjeong-eul chuguhan huyedeul-i iss-eoss-euni geudeul-eun myeolmanghal geos-i la
geuleona hoegaehayeo mid-eum-eul gaj go seon-eul haenghaneun janeun je-oedoeeo cheon gug-e deul-eogal geos-imyeo jogeumdo yogdoem i eobs-eulila
hananimkkeseo geubun-ui jongdeul-ege boiji anhneun eden-ui cheongug-eul yagsog hasyeoss-euni geubun-ui yagsog-i god oli la
geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jabdam-i a nin pyeong-an-ui insaleul deul-eumyeo geu an eseo joseog-eulo geudeul-ui il-yonghal yang sig-eul mankkighanila
geugeos-eun ag-eul gyeong-gyehaneun hana nim-ui jongdeul-ege sangsoghayeo jun cheongug ila

cheonsaga malhagil ulineun junim ui myeonglyeong-i anigoseoneun naelyeogal su eobsdoda uli ap-e issneun geos-ina u li dwie issneun geos-ina geu saie issneun modeun geos-i hananimkke soghano la geudae junim-eun gyeolko ij-ji ani hasinola
cheonjie issneun geosgwa geu saie issneun geos-i junim-ui geos-igeoneul geubun eul seomgim-e iss-eo geubungwa dongdeunghan da leun geos-eul algo issneunyo
midji anihan salamdeul-eun naega jug-eo dasi sal-anal su issdan mal-ingalago maldeulhani
iljjigi ingan-i jonjaehaji a nihaess-eul ttae hananim-i ingan-eul changjo haessdaneun geos-eul ingan-eun mang-gaghago iss neunyo
hananim-i geudeulgwa satandeul-eul bulleomoa muleup-eul kkulhdolog hayeo ji og-ui jubyeon-eulo moige halila
geuleonda-eum hananim-eun gag muli mada hananim-e daehae jeil omanhaess deon jadeul-eul kkeul-eo naelil geos-ila
hananim-eun geugos-eseo nuga bul e tayahal jaingaleul gajang jal algogyesinila
neohui gaunde geogie ileuji anihal ja amudo eobsnani geugeos-eun neohuiga pihal su eobsneun junim-ui danhohan gyeoljeong-isila
geuleona hananimkkeseo ag-eul gyeong gyehaneun jadeul-eun gujehal geos-idoe sa aghan jadeul-eun geu an-eseo muleup-eul kkulhge halila
hananim-ui bunmyeonghan malsseum-i geu deul-ege nangsongdoel ttae bulsinjadeul-eun ga nanhan sin-ang-indeul-ege eoneu jjog-i ji wiga deo na-eumyeo salgie deo joh-eungalago malhadeola
geuleona hananim-eun geudeul ijeon e deo hullyunghago bogijoh-eun jangbileul gajin sedaedeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossnola

illeogalodoe mihog-e ppajinjadohananimkkeseoneun geuui saengmyeong-eul yuyehasini geudeullo hayeogeum yagsogdoen beolgwa naesega ileul ttae eoneu jjog-eo deo na ppeun gos-e iss-eumyeo eoneu jjog-i deo yag han gundaeingaleul aldolog halila
hananimkkeseoneun olbalo ganeun ideul-ege indoham-eul deohasimyeo seonhaeng ui ildeul-eun junim ap-eseo gajang joh-eun geos-eulo bosang-eul badge doelila
hananim-ui malsseum-eul bulsinhamyeonseo jaesangwa jason-i jueojil geos-ila malhaneun jaleul geudaeneun boassneunyo
geuneun boiji anhneun jisig-eul eod eossneunga animyeon hananimgwa yagsog-ila do hayeossdan mal-inyo
gyeolko geuleohji anhnola hananim eun geuga malhaneun geos-eul giloghal geos-i myeo geuege beol-eul deohalila
geuga malhaneun modeun geos-i hana nim-egelo dol-a-eul geos-imyeo geuneun ha nanim ap-e hollo natanalila
geudeul-eun hananim oee daleun geos eul sin-eulo sungbaehayeo geugeos-eulo him gwa yeong-gwang-eul eod-eulyeo hana
gyeolko geuleohji doeji anh-eulini geudeul-eun geudeul-ui usang-eul bulsinhage doego geudeul-ege jeog-i doelila
geudaeneun moleuneunga hananim-i bulsinjadeul-ege satandeul-eul bonaeeo geudeul-eul hwanage haessnola
geuleomeulo geudeul-e daehanghayeo seodulji malla hananim-eun geudeul-ui nal jaleul healigo issnola
geunal-e hananim-eun ag-eul gyeong-gye haneun ideul-eul hananim ap-e bulleo yeong-gwang-eul baddolog halila
geuligo joeindeul-eun jiog-eulo annaehani mogmaleun gachugcheoleom sseuleojilgeos-ila
hananim-ui yagsog-eul bad-eunja oeeneun eoneu nugudo jungjaehaji mos hanila
hananimkkeseo jason-eul dusyeossda malhaneun jadeul-i issdeola
sillo jeodeul-eun bulgyeolhan jujang-eul hanola
geuttaee haneul-i jjij-eojilyeo ha go daejiga gallajimyeo sandeul-i sansan jogag-i doelyeohani
ineun geudeul-i hananimkke jason i issdago bulgyeolhan mal-eul haessgi ttaemun-ila
hananim-eun jason-eul gajil pil-yo ga eobs-eusimae
cheonjiui modeun geos-i jong-eulosseo hananimkkelo ogi ttaemun-ila
jinsillo geubun-eun geudeul-eul algo gyesimyeo ttohan geudeul-eul healigo gye sini
geudeul gagjaneun simpan-ui nal moduga geubun-egelo onila
geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun geudeul-egeneun hananimkkeseo salang-eul bepusinola
hananim-eun gyeong-geonhan jadeul-egeneunbog-eum-eul jeonhago nonjaeng-eul ilsamneun ja deul-egeneun gyeong-gohagi wihae geugeos-eul geudaeui eon-eolo swibge haessnola
geudeul-ijeon hananim-i manh-eun se daeleul myeolmangsikyeossnola geudaeneun geu jung hansalam-ilado balgyeonhal su iss-eumyeo geudeul-ui sogsag-im-eul deul-eul su issneunyo
tta ha
hananim-i geudaeege kkulan-eul gyesiham-eun geugeos-eulo hayeo geudaeleul go saengdoege halyeoham-i anila
hananim-eul dulyeowohaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun-i doege haessnola
geugeos-eun daejiwa nop-eun haneul-eul changjohan geubun-eulo buteo gyesidoen geos ila
hananim-eun gwonjwa-e anj-a gyesineunbun-ila
cheonjie issneun geosgwa geu saie issneun geosgwa daejimit-e issneun modeun geos-i geubunkke soghanola
geudaega keun solilo malhadeon tto neun geuleohji anihadeon sillo geubunkke seoneun bimildo geuligo gamchueojin geos do asinola
hananim oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo geubun-eun gajang aleumdaun ileumdeul-eul gajigo gyesinila
mose-ui yaegiga geudaeege ileu leossneunyo
bola geuga bul-eul bogoseo geuuigajog-ege malhagil gidalila naega bul-eul bunmyeonghi boass-euni bul-eul gajyeo wa geugeos-eulo geu gil-e ileuneun annae jaleul balgyeonhalila
geuga geogie gass-eul ttae moseyahaneun soliga deullideoni
sillo naega neoui junim-igeoneul neoui sinbal-eul beos-eula neoneun seong-yeog-in ttuwa gyegog-e wa issnola
naega neoleul seontaeghayeoss-euni gye sidoeneun geos-e gyeongcheonghala
sillo naega hananim-iyo na oeeneun sin-i eobsnani naman-eul gyeongbaeha go yebaehamyeo naman-eul saeng-gaghala
sillo jongmal-i dagaogo iss-eu na naega geugeos-eul sumgilyeo ham-eun modeun salam-i geuga nolyeoghan daelo bosang-eul baddolog ham-ila
geugeos-eul midji anihago geuui yogmang-eul ttaleuneun jadeullo hayeogeum neo leul jeonhwanhaji anihadolog halini ineun nega myeolmangchi anihadolog ham ila
moseyeo ne oleunson-e issneun geugeos-i mueos-inyo
geuga daedabhagil geugeos-eun je jikkong-iibnida jega geugeos-e gidaego geugeos-eulo namu ipdeul-eul ttaelyeoseo yang eul meog-imyeo geu an-eseo daleun yuyongham eul chajnaida lago hani
geubunkkeseo moseya geugeos-eul deon jyeola hasimae
geuga geugeos-eul deonjini han mali ui baem-idoeeo jaeppalli gieogadeola
ittae geubunkkeseo moseya geugeos eul jwieola geuligo dulyeowohaji mal la naega geugeos-eul dasi wonsangtaelo halila
geudaeui son-eul neoui gyeodeulang-i e neoh-eula amuleon sonsang-i eobs-i ha yahge naolini ineun tto daleun yejeung ila
ileohge hayeo hananim-i neoe ge gajang widaehan hananim-ui yejeung-eul boilyeo ham-ila
palao-ege ga boala geuneun sillo modeun hangyeleul neom-eoseon omanhan jala
ittae mosega juyeo jeoleul wihaejeoui ma-eum-eul hwaljjag yeol-eojusoseo
geuligo jeoui il-i swibdolog hayeo jusoseo
jeoui hyeoe jang-aemul-eul jegeoha yeo jujoseo
geulihayeo geudeul-i jeoui mal-eul ihaehadolog hayeo jusoseo
jeoui gajogjung-ui han salam-i jeoui bowanjaga doedolog hayeo juso seo
alon-eun jeoui hyeongjeini
geulo hayeogeum jeoleul ganghage hago
geuga jeoui il-e hamkke hayeo jusoseo
ineun jeohuiga dangsin-eul keuge chanmihago
jeohuiga dangsin-eul keuge yeom-wonha goja haobnida
sillo dangsin-eun jeohuideul-eul bogo gyesinaida
ie geubun-ui malsseum-i iss-eoss-eu ni moseya neoui yoguga ilueojyeoss nola
hananim-eun daleun ttaeedo neoe ge eunheleul bepul-eossnola
bola neoui eomeonikke yeong-gam-eu loseo gyesileul bonaessnola

geuligo geu aeleul sangja-e neoh-eonailgang-e deonjyeola geu gang-i geuaeleul gang eondeog-eulo eullil geos-ini naui jeog-imyeo tto geuui jeog-in jaga geuaeleul deligo galila geuleona naneun neoe ge naui salang-eul bepul-eoss-euni ineun nega naui an-eseo yang-yugdoedolog haess nola

bola neoui nu-iga wa jega i aeleul yang-yughal han salam-eul annaehayeo deulilkkayo malhadeola geulihayeo hananim-i neoleul neoui eomeonikkelo bonaeni geunyeoui nun-eun pyeong-an-eul chajgo seulpeohaji anhdeola nega geuttaee han salam-eul salhaehayeoss-euna hananim-eun neoleul keun jaeang-eulobuteo guhago neo leul siheom-eulo buteo guhayeossnola mi dian salamdeul saieseo sunyeon dong-an meomuldaga myeonglyeong-e ttala mose nega yeogie wassnola
naega neoleul seontaeghaess-euni ineun naleul wiham-ila
neowa ne hyeongjega naui jingpyoleulgajigo gala geuligo na-e daehan yeom-won-eul geeulli haji malla
neohui dul-eun palao-ege gala geuneun sillo hangyeleul neom-eoseon omanhan jala
geuleona geuege chinjeolhage malhala amado geuneun gyeong-gagsim-eul gajgeo na hananim-eul dulyeowo hal sudo issneunila
geu dul-i malhagil juyeo jeohui neun sillo geuga seodulleo jeohuileul haechiji anh-eulkka ttoneun poaghan jis-eul hajianh-eulkka dulyeobnaida
ie geubunkkeseo dulyeowo haji malla naega neohuiwa hamkke iss-eumyeo deudgo geuligo bogo issnola

geuleoni neohui dul-eun geuege gaseo ulineun junim-i bonaen seonjijala geuleoni uliwa hamkke iseula-el ja sondeul-eul bonaedoe geudeul-eul goelobhiji malla ulineun junim-eulo buteo jingpyo leul gajyeo wassnola bog-eum-eul ttaleuneun ja-ege pyeonghwaga iss-eul geos-ila
bulsinhago deung-eul dollineun ja-e geneun jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ilaneun gyesi ga iss-eossnola
ittae geuga moseya neohuiui junim-eun nugu-inyo lago mul-euni
mosega uliui junim-eun modeun manmul-eul changjohasigo gaggag-ege gineung-eul jusin bun-isila
ittae palaoga geuleom i jeon sedaedeul-ui unmyeong-eun eotteo haessneunyo
geuga malhagil geue daehan jisig eun naui junimkke issnola naui junim-eun silsu hasigeona ij-ji ani hasinola

geubunkkeseoneun dangsindeul-eul wihae daejileul yolam-eulo hayeoss-eumyeo geu an e gil-eul jusieossnola ttohan hananim eun haneullobuteo bileul naelige hayeo geugeos-eulo hayeo yeoleogaji chomog-eul ssagteuge hayeossnola
geugeos-eul il-yonghan yangsig-eulo seob chwihago geuligo neohuideul-ui gachug-eul gilleola sillo jihyega issneun jaleul wihan yejung-i geu an-e issnola
geugeos-eulo buteo hananim-eun neo huileul mandeul-eossgo dasi geugos-eulo neo huileul dollyeo bonaemyeo geugos-eulo buteo neohuiga buhwalhalila
hananim-eun geuege hananim-ui modeun yejeung-eul boyeo jueoss-euna geuneun geoyeoghago baebanhayeossdeola
ittae geuga malhagil moseya neoneun neoui masullosseo uliui ttang-eseo ulileul chubanghalyeo wassneunyo
geuleohdamyeon ulido geuwa gat-eun masul-eul boigessnola geuleoni ulidogeuligo neodo wibanhaji anh-eul yagsog gwa jangsoleul jeonghajago hadeola
mosega malhagil dangsin-ui yagsog eun chugjenallo hadoe taeyang-i sos-eun hue salamdeul-eul moige hasiyo
geuleoja palaoneun mulleoga sul chaeg-eul kkumin hu dasi wassnola
mosega neohuideul-ege jaeang-i iss-euljini hananimkke geojismal-eul hajimalla geubunkkeseo jaeang-eulosseo neohuileulmyeolmangke hasini geojishaneun janeun ban deusi myeolmanghalila
geuleona geudeul-eun seologan-e geu deul-ui il-eul nonjaenghamyeo geugeos-eul bimil lo hanola
geudeul-i malhagil i du salam-eun masulsalo neohuileul neohui ttang-eulo bu teomasullosseo chubanghago neohuideul-uihullyunghan jeontong-eul pagoehalyeo hadoda
geuleom-eulo neohuideul-ui sulchaeg-eul uinonhayeo ola oneul-eul abdohan ja ga seunglijaga doelila
ittae geudeul-i moseya nega meonjeo deonjigessneunga ttoneun uliga meon jeo deonjilkka lago hani
geuga malhagil neohuiga meonjeo deon jila hayeossdeola geuttae geudeul-ui basjul gwa jipang-iga geudeul-ui yosullo sal-a umjig-ineun geoscheoleom boideola
geuttae moseneun geuui simjung-e bul-anham-eul neujjyeoss-euni
hananim-i malhagil dulyeowo ha ji malla sillo nega wie issnola

neoui oleunson-e issneun geos-eul deonjyeola geugeos-i jaeppalli geudeul-ui yosul gwa masul-ui sulchaeg-i kkumineun geos-eul samkyeobeolil geos-iyo masulsaneun geuga ga neun gosmada seunglihaji moshalila
geuleoja masulsadeul-i buboghamyeonseo jeohuineun alongwa mose-ui junim-eul midnaida hadeola

ittae geuga malhagil neohuineun naega heolaghagi jeon-e geuleul mid-eossneu nyo geuneun balo neohuiege masul-eul galeuchyeojun jaigeoneul naneun neohuiui son deulgwa baldeul-eul eosgallige jalla jonglyeo namugajie geol-eo noh-eulila ittae neohuineun uli gaunde eoneu pyeon-i boda simhago olaen beol-eul naelige doeneunji alge doelila hani

geudeul-i malhadeola ulineun dang sinboda uliege yejeung-eul boyeo ju sigo ulileul changjohan hananim-eul joh a hanani dangsin-i gyeoljeonghan daelo hasoseo dangsin-eun sillo hyeonse-ui saenghwalman eul gyeoljeonghal su bakk-en eobs-euliyo
sillo ulineun junim-eul mid-eumyeo uliui joewa dangsin-i gang-yohayeossdeon masul-eul yongseobad-eul geos-ini hananim-eunseon-iyo yeong-wonhasim-ila
joein-eulo geuui junimkke on jageuleul wihae jiog-i iss-euni geuneun geuan-eseo jugjido anihago saljido moshanila
geuleona seon-eul haenghaneun sin-ang-in i geu bunkke ol ttaeneun geudeul-eul wihae choegoui wolgyegwan-i iss-eumyeo
alaee mul-i heuleuneun eden-ui cheongug-i iss-eo geu an-eseo yeongsaenghali ni ineun joeag-eulobuteo jasin-eul jeong hwahan ja-e daehan bosang-ila

hananim-i moseege gyesi ha yeoss-euni naui jongdeul-eul deligo bamjung e tteonal geos-imyeo geudeul-eul wihae ba da-e maleun gil-eul naeeola geuligo chugyeog-eul danghalkka dulyeowo haji malmyeo igsahaji anh-eulkka dulyeowo haji mal la hasyeossnola
ittae palaoga geuui gundaeleul ikkeulgo chugyeoghaess-euna badaga geudeul-eul-wanjeonhi deopchyeo samkeogbeolyeossnola
ilihayeo palaoneun geuui baeg seong-eul banghwangke haess-eulppun baleuge indo haji moshaessnola
iseula-el jasondeul-iyeo hananim-i jeog-eulo buteo neohuileul guhago sinai gyegog oleunpyeon-eseo neohuiege yagsog-eul maej-eoss-eumyeo neohuiege manna wa ssal-waleul jueossnola

hananim-i neohuiege bepun yang sigjung-e joh-eun geos-eul il-yonghal yangsig-eu lo hadoe nangbihaji malla ineun nauinoyeoum-i neohuiege naelyeojiji anhgiwiham-iyo naui noyeoum-eul bad-eun ja neun nugudeun myeolmanghanola
sillo naega gwan-yong-eul bepulgeoneul hoegaehago mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun geuege gwan-yong-eul bepuni geuneun baleun gillo indo bad-eulila
moseya mueos-i neolo hayeogeum neoui baegseong-e apseo seoduldolog hayeoss neunyo
ittae geuga daedabhagil geudeul-eun je dwie onaida jega dangsinkke seodulleo wass-eum-eun dangsin-eul gippeuge hago ja haessseubnida
hananim-i nega eobsneun dong-an-e uliga neoui baegseong-eul siheomhayeoss-eunisamili baegseong-i geudeul-eul banghwangke ha yeossnola

geuleoja moseneun keuge hwaleul naego seulpeohamyeo geuui baegseong-egelo dol awa baegseongdeul-iyeo junimkkeseo joh-eun yagsog-eul haji anhhaessdeonyo geu yagsog-ineohuiege olaedoen geos gat-i boyeossdeo nyo animyeon junim-ui hwaga neohuiege naelyeojigileul wonhaessneunyo neohuineun nawaui yagsog-eul kkaetteulyeossnola

geudeul-i daedabhagil jeohuiui neung lyeog-eulosseo seuseulo dangsin-ui yagsog-eul kkaetteuliji ani haessnaida baegseong-ui mugeoun jangsigpumdeul-eul olmgyeoyaman haess gie geugeos-eul bulsog-e deonjyeobeolyeossgo geugeos-eun samiliin-i jesihan geos-ieossseubnida
geulihayeo geuga geudeul-ege song aji hanmalileul hyeongsanghwahani soui ul-eumsoli gatdeola geuligo malhagil igeos-i neohuideul-ui sin-imyeo mose-ui sin ieossneunde geuga ij-eossnola
geugeos-eun geudeul-ege amuleon dae dabdo moshamyeo geudeul-eul haelobhigeona ilobge hal amuleon himdo eobsneun geos-eul-alji moshaneunyo
ijeon-e imi alon-i baegseong deul-iyeo sillo neohuiga geugeos-eulo si heom-eul bad-assnola neohuiui junim-eun ga jang jaaelousin bun-isila geuleomeulonaleul ttaleugo nae mal-e sunjonghala
ie geudeul-i malhagil mosega uliege dol-a-eul ttaekkaji geugeos-eul sungbaeham-e meomchuji anh-eulila
geuga malhagil alon-iyeo banghwang haneun geudeul-eul bogoseo mueosttaemun-e jujeohago iss-eossneunyo
neoneun wae naleul ttaleuji anihago naui myeonglyeong-eul geoyeoghaessneunyo

ittae alon-i daedabhagil nae eomeoniui adeul-iyeo naui suyeomgwa naui meolikalag-eul butjabji masoseo naneun sillo dangsinkkeseo nega iseula el jasondeul-eul bun-yeolsikyeossgo na mose ui myeonglyeong-eul gidaliji anihaessda mal halkka dulyeobnaida
mosega samiliege neoui mog jeog-eun mueos-inyo lago malhani

samiliga daedabhagil jeoneun geu deul-i boji moshan geos-eul bogo geu sa jaui balmit-eseo han jum-ui heulg-eul jib eo song-ajiege deonjyeossseubnida je yeong hon-i geuleohge myeonglyeonghayeossseubnida

mosega samiliege mulleogala geudaeneun pyeongsaeng dong-an naege sondaeji mal lago malhalgeos-ila eogim-eobsneun yagsog i nege ol geos-ila nega sungbaehaess deon neoui sin-eul bola hananim-i geu geos-eul hwayeomsog-e bultaewo sansanhi ba da-e ppulil geos-ila
geuleona neohuiui sin-eun hananim ppun-igeoneul geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eu myeo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul algo gyesini la
ileohge hananim-eun geudaeege iss-eossdeon iyagileul deullyeojueossgo me sejido jueossnola
ilobuteo deung-eul dollineun ja neun nugudeun simpan-ui nal-e mugeoun jim eul jil geos-imyeo
geudeul-eun buhwal-ui geunalkkaji mugeoun jim-eul jigo sal geos-ila
napal-i ullineun geunal hani nim-eun joejieo dulyeoum-e chan puleun nun eul han joeindeul-eul bulleo mo-eulila
geudeul-eun naj-eun solilo neohuineun-yeolheul oeeneun chelyuhaji anh-eul geos-i lago sogsag-ina
hananim-eun geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eul algo issnola geuttae geudeul jung-e yagsagppaleun jaga neohuineun gyeou halu meomulleoss-eul ppun-ibnida hadeola
geudeul-i geu sandeul-e gwanhayeo mudgeodeun illeo galodoe naui junimkke seo geugeosdeul-eul jogag-eulo busueo meon jilo heut-eojige hasila
geuleohge hayeo geubunkkeseoneun geugeosdeul-eul pyeongjilo namgyeodul geos-ila
geudaeneun geu an-eseo naj-eun gos do nop-eun gosdo boji moshalila
geunal salamdeul-eun gulgog-i eobsneunhananim-ui buleum-eul ttalagal geos-imyeo modeun solineun hananim ap-eseo gyeomson hamae geudeul-ui joyonghan baldidneun soli oeeneun deudji moshalila
geunal-eneun eotteon jungjaedo hyoyong-i eobs-eudoe hananim-i heolaghan janeun je-oela geubun-eun geuui mal-e gippeoha sinila
geubun-eun geudeul ijeon-e iss-eossdeongeosgwa geudeul ihue iss-eossdeon geos-eul al go gyesina geudeul-eun geubun-e gwanhayeo jisig-i eobsnola
geu eolguldeul-eun yeong-wonhi gyesi neun hananim ap-eseo cholahaejimyeo bul sinhaessdeon janeun sillo jeolmanghanola
geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun janeun jeolmangdo bosang-ui sonsil do yeomlyeohaji anhnola
geuleohge hayeo hananim-eun alab-eolo kkulan-eul gyesihayeossgo geu an-e seo yeoleo gajilo gyeong-goleul haess-euni i lohayeo geudeul-i hananim-eul saeng-gaghamyeo gong-gyeongtolog haessnola
hananim-eun modeun geos wie gye simyeo wang-iyo jinliisini geubun-ui malsseum-i jonglyodoel ttaekkaji kkulan-ui gye sileul seodulji malgo juyeo jeoege jisig-eul deohayeo juobsoseo
olaejeon-e hananim-i adam-e ge seong-yag-eul haess-euna geuneun geugeos-eul ij-eossdeola geuleona geuegeseo gouiseong eul balgyeonhaji moshaessnola
geuttae hananim-eun cheonsadeul-ege adam-ege buboghala hamae ibeulli seuleul je-oehan moduga buboghayeossdeola
hananim-i adam-ege adam-a igeos-i balo neowa ne anaeui jeog ila geuga neohuileul yuhoghayeo cheongug eseo jjoch-anae neohuileul bulhaenghage ha lyeo hanola
geugos-eseo neohuiga gulmjuliji anihago heolbeosji anh-eulila
geugos-eneun galjeungdo eobs-eumyeo tteugeoun yeolsado eobsnola
geuleona satan-i adam-a naeganeoleul yeongsaeng-ui namuwa bulmyeol-ui wang-gug eulo annaehayeo juliyo lago sogsag yeossdeola

geuleohge hayeo geudeul-i geugeos eul meog-eumae geudeul-ui beolgeobeos-eum-i geudeul-ege natanassdeola geuleoja geudeul eun cheongug-ui namu ip-eulo geugos-eul ga ligi sijaghaessgo adam-eun geuui junim ui myeonglyeong-eul baebanhaess-euni geuneun banghwang hage doeeossdeola
geuleona junim-eun geuleul seontaeghasyeossgo geuneun geubun-ege hoegaehani geu bun-eun geuleul indohasyeossnola

geubunkkeseo neohui moduneun yeo giseo nagala seologa seolo-ege jeog ila geuleona naega neohuiege bog-eum eul bonael geos-ila naui bog-eum-eul tta leuneun janeun banghwanghaji anihago bul haenghaji anh-eul geos-ila
geuleona naui gyohun-e deung-eul dollineun janeun nuguna gungpibhal geos-i myeo simpan-ui nal-e ulineun geuleul jangnim eulo mandeul-eo buhwalke halila
geuttae geuga juyeo wae jeoleul jangnim-eulo buleusyeossnaikka jeoneun silyeog i iss-eossnaida lago hani
geubunkkeseo malsseumhasa uliga neoege yejeung-eul bonaess-euna neoneun geu geos-eul musihaess-euni oneul-eun nega mu si danghalila
hananim-eun bangtanghan jawa junim-ui gyesileul midji anihan ja-ege bo sanghamae naese-ui ungbeol-eun hancheung simha go gyesogdoenila

hananim-i geudeul-eul wihan ye jung-eulo eolmana manh-eun sedaeleul myeolmang ke hayeossdeonyo geudeul-i jigeum geu geoju jieseo salgo issji anhdeonyo geuan-e neun jihyega issneun salamdeul-eul wihan ye jeungdeul-i issnola
geudeul-eul beolhaneun sigiwa gigan-eul yuyehaneun malsseum-i eobs-eossdeolamyeon imi beol-i geudeul-ege iss-eoss-eul geos-i la

geuleomeulo geudaeneun geudeul-i malhaneun geos-e innaehamyeo taeyang-i tteu go jigijeon-e tto bam-e geudaeui junim-eul chan-yanghala naj-edo geubun-eul chanmihala geudaeege gippeum-i iss-eul geos-ila

hananim-i geudeuljung ilbuege jun hyeonse-ui yeonghwa-e nun-eul dolliji mal la sillo hananim-eun geugeos-eul tonghayeo geudeul-eul siheomhanola junim-i jusineun yangsig-eun gajang joh-eun geos-iyo yeong-wonhan geos-ila
geudaeui baegseongdeul-i yebaeleul deuligo geugeos-e innaehadolog hala ha nanim-eun geu yangsig-eul guhaji aniha go yangsig-eul bepunola naese-ui yeolmae neun gyeong-geonhan jaleul wihan geos-ila
geudeul-i malhagil geuneun wae u liege geuui junim-eulobuteo yejeung-eul boiji anhneunyo lago hana ijeon-ui seongseoeseo geudeul-ege yejeung-i ileuji ani hayeossda hadeonyo

man-il hananim-i geudeul-eul jingbeollo myeolmangsikyeossdamyeon junim-isiyeo dangsin kkeseo jeohuiege seonjijaleul bonaesyeossda myeon jeohuineun bunmyeonghi bulmyeong-yewa suchi leul gajgi jeon-e dangsin-ui malsseum-eul ttalass eulilago geudeul-eun malhal geos-ila
illeo galodoe uli gagjaneun gidaligo issnani neohuido gidalila nuga olh-eun gil-eul geodgo iss-eumyeo olba leun gillo indodoeneungaleul god alge doe lila
geudeul-e daehan gyesan-i gakkawass eudoe geudeul-eun ajig kkaedadji moshago deung-eul dollidoda
geudeul-eun junim-eulobuteo saeloun mesejiga ileul ttae mada geugeos-eul jolonghamyeo deudgo issnola
geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun gyeongbaghago joe jieun jadeul-eun geudeul-ui mildam-eul sumgi myeo isalam-eun neohuiwa gat-eun ingan-i aninyo neohuineun yosul-eul bomyeonseo geu e eunghaneunyo
geudaeyeo malhala naui junim-eun cheonjieseo sogsag-ineun modeun geos-eul a sinani geubun-eun modeun geos-eul deul-eusi go asim-ila

bola geudeul-eun malhagileul geugeos-eunkkum-ui chaglan-eseo on geos-eulo geuga geugeos-eul naljohan geos-imyeo geuneun siin ila geuleohdamyeon yeeonjadeul-i seonjodeul ege boyeojueossdeon geoscheoleom uliege yejung-eul boilago hadeola
hananim-i myeolmangsikin go-eul-ui eo neu baegseongdo midji anihayeossneunde geu deul-eun midgessneunyo
hananim-i geudae ijeon-e gyesileulnaelin seonjijadeuldo salam-ieossgeoneul myeon mesejileul aneun ideul-ege mul-eo bola
hananim-eun geudeul-i eumsig-eul seob chwihaji anihan mom-eulo mandeulji a ni haess-euni geudeuldo yeong-wonhi salji mos haessnola
geuleon hu hananim-eun geudeul-ege yagsog-eul ihaenghasa geubun-i wonhaessdeon daelo geudeul-eul guhago saaghan jadeul eul myeolmangsikyeossnola
hananim-i neohuideul-ege neohuileul wihan malsseum-eulo han seongseoleul bonaess-eu doe neohuineun ajigdo alji moshaneunyo
hananim-i joejieun baegseong-eul eol mana manh-i myeolmangsikyeoss-eumyeo geuhue daleun minjog-eul eolmana manh-i sewossdeo nyo
geudeul-i hananim-ui museoun beol eul alja geuttae geudeul-eun seodulleo domang haessnola
dojuhalyeo malgo neohuiege ju eojyeossdeon hyeonse-ui gippeumgwa neohuiui ju geojilo dol-aola amado neohuineun jilmun-eul bad-eulila
ittae geudeul-eun seulpeudoda sillo uliga choeleul jieossnaida lago ha mae
hananim-i geudeul-eul nas-eulo be eonon samyeolhan sigmulcheoleom mandeulttaekkaji geudeul-ui geu jeolgyuneun geuchiji ani ha deola
hananim-i haneulgwa ttang-gwa geu saiui modeun geos-eul changjohan geos-eun jangnan i anila
hananim-i hyanglag-eul nuligoja wonhaessdeolamyeon geubun-ui geos-eulo geuleohge hasyeoss-eulila geubun-eun haenghasineun bun-i sigi ttaemun-ila
geuleona geuleohge anihago heo wi wie jinlileul deonjini geugeos-ui meo liga busueojideogla wiseon-eun manghago neohuiga myosahan geos-eneun jaeang-i iss nola
cheonjie issneun modeun geos-i geubun-e soghamyeo geubun gakkaie issneun cheon sadeul-eun geubun-eul gyeongbaeham-e geomanhaji anihago jichiji anhdeola
geudeul-eun bamnaj-eulo geubun-eul chan-yanghamyeonseodo gilyeog-i soetoehaji anhdeola
geudeul-eun jug-eunjaleul salgehal su issneun jisang-ui sin-eul seontaeghaessdan mal-inyo

man-il geu an-e hananim oee daleun sindeul-i iss-eossdamyeon geu dul-eun bung-goehayeoss-eulila ogjwaui junim-isin hananim geuligo geudeul-i myosahaneun geos wie nop-i gyesin hananimman-eul chan mihala
geubun-i haenghasin geos-e daehaeseo neun jilmun-eul badji anihana geudeul-eun simmun-eul badnila

geudeul-eun geubun oee daleun sindeul eul sungbaehaneunyo illeogalodoe jeung-geoleul gajyeoola igeos-eun nawa hamkke han me sejiyo nae ijeon-e iss-eossdeon ideul-ui mesejila geuleona geudeul daedasuneun jinlileul kkaedadji moshago deung-eul dolli deola
geudae ijeon-e seonjijaleul bonae eo gyesileul naelil ttaedo na oeeneun sin-i eobsnani naman-eul gyeongbaehala ha yeossnola
hananimkkeseo jasig-eul dusyeossda bulsinjadeul-i malhago issdoda hana nim-iyeo hollo yeong-gwangbad-eusoseo geudeul-eunjongyeongbad-eun jongdeul-ibnida
geudeul-eun hananim malsseum ijeon-e haenghaji anihago danji geubun-ui myeong lyeong-e ttala haengdonghal ppun-ila

geubun-eun geudeul ap-e issneun geosgwadwie issneun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila geudeul-eun geubun-i heolaghaneun jaleul je-oehagoneun jungjaehaji anihani geudeul-eun geubun-eul dulyeowohago gyeong-oeha nola
geudeul gaunde geubun anin nae ga sin-ila malhaneunja issdamyeon hana nim-eun geuleul jiog-eulo bosanghamyeo joe indeul-egedo geuwa gat-i bosanghalila

bulsinjadeul-eun haneulgwa ttang-i ha nayeoss-eum-eul alji moshaneunyo hananim-eunhaneulgwa ttang-eul bunlihago mul-eul modeun saengmyeongche-ui geunbon-eulo dusyeoss-euna geudeul-eun midji anihalyeo haneunyo
hananim-eun daejiwie sandeul-eul gojeongsikyeoss-euni geugeos-i dong-yochi mos hadolog ham-imyeo ttohan hananim-i geu an-e neolb-eun dololeul dueo geudeul-i indobaddolog hanola
hananim-eun haneul-e jal bohodoen jibung-eul dueossnola geudeul-eun ajigdo geugeos-ui yejeung-e deung-eul dolligo issneu nyo
geubunkkeseo bamgwa naj taeyang-gwa dal-eul changjohasini modeun geos-i geu an-eseo gwedo-e ttala unhaenghanola
hananim-eun geudae ijeon-e eotteon ingan-egedo yeongsaeng-eul buyeohaji a ni haessgeoneul ttohan geudaedo yeong-wonhal sueobs-eumae geudeul-i yeong-wonhal su issgessneu nyo
modeun ingan-eun jug-eum-eul masboge doemyeo hananim-eun neohuileul aggwa seon-eu lo siheomhalini ittae neohuineun hana nim-egelo gwiuihanola
bulsinjadeul-i geudaeleul bol ttaemyeon neohuiui sindeul-eul bibanghaneun jaga i salam-inyo lago geudaeleul jolonghal tta leum-ila sillo geudeul-eun hananim-eul geo yeoghaneun bulsinjadeul-ila
ingan-eun seong-geubhan sogseong-eulo chang jodoeeossnola naega jigeum geudaeege naui yejeungdeul-eul boyeojulini seoduljimalla
neohuiga jinsilhan jadeul-ilamyeon eonje i yagsog-i oneunyo lago geu deul-i malhalila
man-il bulsinjadeul-i geudeul-ui eol gullobuteo geuligo geudeul dwilobuteo bul-eul mag-eul su eobsdaneun sigileul al-ass-eul ttae geudeul-eun guwon-eul badgessneunyo
geuleohji moshalila geugeos-i gab jagi geudeul-ege dolaehayeo geudeul-eul honlanke hani geudeul-eun geugeos-eul mag-eul him-i eobs-eumyeo yuyedoejido anhnola
geudae ijeon-e manh-eun seonjijadeul do jolong-eul danghaess-euna jolong-eul hadeon geudeul-i jolonghaessdeon geos-e ewossaigomal-assnola
illeogalodoe bamgwa naj-eulo nu ga hananim-ui noyeoum-eulobuteo neohuileul jikyeo jugessneunyo geuleona geudeul-eun ajigdo geudeul-ui junim-eul yeom-wonham-e deung-eul dolligo issnola
animyeon hananim oee geudeul-eul jikyeo jul sindeul-i issneunyo geugeos-eun geudeul seuseuloleul doul sudo eobs-eumyeo hananim-ui bohodo badji moshanola

geuleona hananim-i ideulgwa geu deul seonjodeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig-eul ju eo olae saldolog haess-eudoe uliga jisang-eul chaj-awa geuui cheugmyeon-eulo buteo chugsohaegam-eul geudeul-eun alji moshaji anhneunyo geuleondedo geudeul-i seunglijadeul-ila hal su issneunyo
illeogalodoe sillo naneun gyesi e uihayeo neohuideul-ege gyeong-gohal ppun ila geuleona gwimeogeolineun gyeong-gohaneunbuleum-eul deul-eul su eobsnola
geuleona junim-ui jogeumahan beol man geudeul-eul seuchyeogado uliege jae ang-i issdani bunmyeong uliga joeindeul ila hadeola

hananim-eun simpan-ui nal gongjeonghan jeoul-eul junbihanani eoneu nugudo bulgongpyeonghan daeuleul badji anhdolog ham ila bilog gyeojassimanhan mugeiljila do geubun-eun geugeos-eul deuleonae gyesanha lini gyesan-eun hananimman-eulo chungbunha nila
hananim-eun mosewa alon-ege sigbyeol-ui jungpyoleul jueossnani ineun gyeong geonhan ideul-eul wihan bich-iyo gyohun-ila
geudeul simjung-e junim-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul-eun unmyeong-ui sigag-eul dulyeo wo hanola
igeos-i balo hananim-i gyesi han chugbogbad-eun mesejiigeoneul neohuineun geugeos-eul geobuhagessneunyo
hananim-eun ijeon-e abeulaham ege jichimseoleul jueoss-eumyeo geuleul jal asinola
geuttae geuneun geuui abeojiwa baegseong-ege yeoleobundeul-i sungbaehaneun i usangdeul-i mueos-inyo lago malha yeossdeola
ittae geudeul-eun uli seonjodeul-i geugeos-eul sungbaehaessnolago malhaja
geuga malhagil yeoleobungwa yeoleo bun-ui seonjodeul-i bunmyeonghi banghwanghaessnola
geudeul-i malhagil nega ulie ge jinsil-eul malhaneunyo animyeon uli leul jolonghaneunyo
ittae geuga malhagil neohuiui junim-eun cheonjileul changjohasin bun-igeoneul naega geugeos-eul jeungmyeonghaneun han jung-in-i la
hananimkke maengsehasa naneun neo huiga deung-eul deulligo tteonan hue neohuiusangdeul-e daehanghaneun gyehoeg-eul se-ulila
geulihayeo geuneun gajang keun u sang-eul je-oehan modeun geos-eul kkaetteulyeossno la amado geudeul-i geuegelo dol-a olila
geudeul-i dol-awa malhagil nuga uliui sindeul-ege ileon jis-eul haessneu nyo sillo saaghan jadeul-ila
geudeul-i malhagil abeulaham-ilaneun cheongnyeon-i geugeos-e gwanhayeo malhaneun geos-eul deul-eossseubnida
geudeul-i malhagil geuleul salam deul boneundelo delyeoola ama geudeul i jeung-eon-eul halila
i sindeul-eul pagoehan jaga baloabeulaham neoinyo lago geudeul-i mal hani
geuga malhagil amado geudeul gaunde dumog-i geulaess-eulila geudeul-i mal-eul hal su issdamyeon mul-eobola hayeossdeola
geuleoja geudeul-eun seolo dol-abo myeonseo sillo uliga jalmoshago issno lago maldeulhadeola
geuleon hu geudeul-eun suchiseuleoum eulo danghwanghamyeo malhagil neoneun ideul i malhaji mosham-eul jal algo issno la
geuga malhagil hananim daesin neohuiege yuighajido anihago haeloumdo eobsneun geos-eul sungbaehago issneunyo
hananim oee daleun geos-eul midneundangsindeul-i galyeonhadaneun geos-eul neohuineun-alji moshaneunyo
geuleoja geudeul-i malhagil seungli halyeomyeon geuleul bultaewo beoligo sindeul eul bohohala hadeola
hananim-i myeonglyeonghasa bul-a sig eola geuligo abeulaham-eul anjeonke hala hayeossnola
ileohdeus geudeul-i geuege eummo leul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geudeul-eul pae baejalo mandeul-eossnola
hananim-i geuleul guhago geuwa lus-eul baegseongdeul-eul wihae chugbognaelin ttang eulo annaehayeossnola
hananim-eun geuege isag-eul ju eossgo sonjalo yagob-eul jueoss-eumyeo geu deul moduleul uiloun jalo mandeul-eossno la

hananim-eun geudeul-eul geubun-ui myeong lyeong-e ttala baegseong-eul indohaneun jido jadeullo dueossgo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhago yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul naedologgyesileul naelini geudeul-eun geubun-ege bogjonghayeossdeola
los-ege jihyewa jisig-eul ju eo bulgyeolhan il-eul hayeo wassdeon go-eullobuteo geuleul guhaess-euni sillo geudeul-eun saag-eul haenghaneun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
hananim-eun geuege jabileul be pul-eossnola geuneun sillo uiin jung-eseo han salam-ieossdeola
noaga ijeon-e hananim-ege guwonhaess-eul ttae hananim-eun geuege dab hayeo geuwa geuui gajog-eul keun jaeang eulobuteo guhayeossnola
hananim-ui malsseum-eul bujeonghan baeg seong-eulobuteo geuleul guhan hu geudeul moduneun saaghan baegseong-iyeoss-eumeulo hananim-eun geudeul moduleul igsake hayeossno la

dawisgwa sollomon-eul sang-giha la eotteon baegseong-ui yangdeul-i bamjung-e gil-eul jalmosdeul-eo nongjang-eul jisbalb-a noh-ass eul ttae geu dul-eun simpan-eul hayeossgo ha nanim-eun geudeul-ui simpan-eul moggyeoghayeossnola

hananim-eun sollomon-eulo hayeo geu munjeleul ihaetolog hago geudeul gagja-ege jihyewa jisig-eul jueoss-eumyeo sandeulgwa saedeullo hayeogeum dawisgwa deo bul-eo hananim-eul wihae chansongke hayeoss euni hananim-eun geuleohge hal su iss eossnola
hananim-eun dawis-ege gab-os-eul mandeuneun geos-eul galeuchyeo jueossnani ineun neohuiga jeonjaeng-eseo neohuileul boho hagi wiham-ila neohuineun gamsahago issneunyo
sollomon-ege neunglyeog-eul jusa ha nanim-i chugboghan ttang-eulo geuui myeong lyeong-e ttala pogpung-uga buldoleug hayeoss-eu ni hananim-eun modeun geos-eul algo gyesinola
sollomon-eul wihayeo jamsudeul-eul hayeo geuege sunjongtolog hayeossgo geubakk-ui daleun il-eul hage hayeoss-eumyeo ie hananim-eun geudeul-i geuui myeonglyeong-eseo beos-eonaji moshadolog hayeossnola
yob-eul sang-gihala geuneun junimkke gang-guhayeossnola jaeang-eulo jega goelobnaida dangsin-eun gajang jabilousigojaaelousini eunhyeleul bepul-eo juobsoseo
hananim-eun geuui gancheong-e dabha yeo geuga cheohan jaeang-eul geodugo geuga ilh-eobeolin jasondeul-eul dasi eodge ha yeoss-euni ineun geubun-ui eunhyeyo modeun jongdeul-eul wihan gyohun-ila
iseuma-elgwa ideuliseuwa julki peul-e gwanhan iyagileul geudaeui baegseong ege sang-gisikila geudeul moduneun in naehaneun ja jung-e iss-eossnola
hananim-eun geudeul-eul uliui eun hyesog-e deulgehayeoss-euni geudeul-eun sillo uiloun jadeulgaunde iss-eossdeola

yona-e gwanhan iyagileul geudae ui baegseong-ege sang-gihalini geuneun hwa gana tteonamyeo hananim-i geuleul jeab haji moshalila chucheughaessnola geuleona geudo yeoggyeong-e cheohal ttaeneun sillo dangsin oeeneun sin-i eobsnani dangsinman-eul chan mihanaida jeoneun sillo joeindeul mu lijung-e iss-eossseubnida hadeola
hananim-eun hoso-e eunghasa geu leul gotong-eulobuteo guhago midneun sin ang-indeul-eul guwonhaessnola
jakaliyaui iyagileul sang-gisikiljini geuneun junimkke guwonhayeossnolajuyeo jeoleul hollo duji maobsoseo dangsin-eun gajang hullyunghasin sangsogjaisibnida

geuui gancheong-e hananim-i eungha sa geuege yohan-eul bonaessgo geuleul wihae geuui anaeleul jeongsang-eulo hayeoss euni ideul-eun seonhaeng-eul silcheonham-e seo dulleo hamyeo gidaewa dulyeoum-eulo ha nanim-ege hosohago hananim-eul du lyeowo hayeossdeola

geunyeoui iyagileul sang-gihala geunyeoneun sungyeol-eul jikyeoss-euni hananim-eungeunyeoege seonglyeong-eul bul-eoneoh-eo geunyeo wa geunyeoui adeullo hayeo on baegseong-eul-wihan yejung-eulo hayeossnola
iseullam-eun neohuileul wihan yuil han jong-gyoimyeo naega neohuiui junim-i geoneul naman-eul gyeongbaehala
geuleona geudeul-eun bun-yeolhayeoss-eunigeudeul moduneun hananim-egelo gwiuihalila
mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun janeun nugudeun geuui nolyeog-i heosdoeji ani halini sillo hananim-eun geuleul wihae giloghanola
uliga myeolmangsikin go-eul-i iss nani go-eul-eul dasi il-eonaji mosha nola
gogeuwa magogeu baegseongdeul-i jang byeog-eul ttulhgo nop-eun gos-eulo buteo swaedohayeo ol geos-ila
jinliui yagsog-i gakkawa eulttae bulsinjadeul-ui nundeul-eun gongpolo gadeugchauliege ileon bulhwaga wen-il-inyo uliga igeos-eul musihaess-euni uligajoeindeul-ila
sillo neohuiwa hananim anin daleun geos-eul sungbaehan geosdeul-eun jiog-ui ttaelgam-igeoneul neohuineun geu an-eulo deul eogage doelila
man-il ideul-i sindeul-ieossdamyeon geudeul-eun geogie oji anihaess-eulilageudeul moduneun geu an-eseo yeongjuhanola
geugos-e geudeul-eul wihan beonmin ui solineun iss-euna geudeul-eun deudji mos hanila
hananim-egeseo hullyunghan bosang ui yagsog-eul bad-eun jadeul-eun geugos-eulobuteo meon gos-e issge doel geos-ila
geugos-ui so-eumdo deudji ani hamyeo geudeul-ui yeonghondeul-i wonhaneun geu gos-eseo yeongjuhanola
gajang keun museoumdo geudeul-eul seulpeuge haji anihago ohilyeo cheon sadeul-i geudeul-eul yeongjeobhamyeo oneul-eun dangsindeul-i yagsogbad-eun nal-ila hamyeonseo maj-ihalila
hananim-i haneul-eul jeob-eobeolil geunal-eul sang-gihala taecho-e changjohaessdeus i geubun-eun geugeos-eul dasi changjohali ni geubun-i yagsoghan geos-eun bandeusi su haengdoenola
geu gyesi ihue hananim-eun ijeon sipyeon-eseo daejineun naui seongsil han jongdeul-i sangsoghalila hayeossnola
jinsillo i an-eneun hananim eul gyeongbaehaneun baegseong-eul wihan sosig-i issnola
hananim-i geudaeleul bonaem-eun manbaegseong-ege jabileul bepulgi wihaeseola
illeo galodoe sillo naege gye siga naelyeojyeoss-eudoe neohuiui sindo ha nanim hanbun-igeoneul sunjonghaji anhgess neunyo

geudeul-i deung-eul dollindamyeon il leogalodoe naneun naega myeonglyeongbad-eun geos ol neohuiege allyeojueoss-eul ppun-imyeo neohuiga yagsogbad-eun geos-i gakkawassneunji meol-eossneunji naneun alji moshanola
sillo geubun-eun bakk-eulo deul-eonaeeo malhaneun geosgwa sumgineun geosdo algo gyesinola
igeos-eun neohuie daehan siheom eulo sungan-ui hyanglag-e bulgwahanila
geuga malhayeossdeola juyeo jin liloseo jeohuileul daseulyeo jusoseo jeo deul-ui bulsin-eul innaeham-e jaaelousinjunimkke guwonhanaida
salamdeul-iyeo junim-eul dulyeowohala sillo simpan-ui nal-ui jijin-eun mu seounila

geunal geudaedeul-eun jikyeobolini modeun yumoga jeojmeog-ineun geos-eul ij-eul geos-imyeo imsinhan modeun yeoseong-i yusan hadoda geudaeneun sulchwihan salamdeul-eul bol geos-ina geudeul-eun chwihan geos-i anila hananim-ui jingbeol-i museowossgi ttae mun-ila
salamdeul jung-eneun mujihayeo hananim-e gwanhayeo nonjaenghamyeo ban-yeoghaneun satan-eul ttaleugo issneunyo
geuleul bohojalo haneun janeun sil lo banghwanghage doemyeo taoleuneun bul-ui jingbeollo indodoem-i geue daehan unmyeong ila

salamdeul-iyeo buhwal-e gwanhayeo uisimhago issdamyeon taechoui changjoleul bo la sillo hananim-i neohuileul heulg-eseo changjohan hu hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo geu hu eunghyeollo geuligoneun sal-eul but-ini wanjeonhan hyeongsang-gwa wanseongchi anihan hyeong sang-eulo doeeossdeola ineun neohuiege hananim-ui neunglyeog-eul boigoja ham-ila ttohan geubun-ui tteus-e ttala jeonghayeojin gigan-e taenaeeseo jalage han hu a ilosseo chulsanke hago yang-yughayeo chung bunhi seongjangtolog hadaga neohui gaun de ilbuneun jeolm-eoseo jug-eum-ui buleum-eul badge hago ilbuneun nolyeong-e ileuge hayeo al-assdeon jasigmajeodo alji mus hage doenola ttohan geudaeneun hwangpyeha ge doego saengmyeong-eul ilh-eun daejileul bogedoelila geuleona hananim-i geugos-e bileul naelil ttae daejineun dasi saengdonghago sos-a oleumyeo modeun jonglyuui aleumdaun chomogdeul-i saengseonghanola
igeos-eun god hananim-i jinlilo jug-eun jaleul salge hasimyeo modeun il-e jeonjijeonneung hasineun bun-isila
uisimhalba eobsneun jongmal-i omyeon hananimkkeseoneun mudeomsog-e issneun jadeul eul buhwal sikinila
salamdeul jung-eneun amuleon jisigdo indojado bog-eumdo gaj-ji moshan geudeul i hananim-e daehayeo nonjaenghaneun ja ga iss-eumyeo

oman-eulo tain-eul hananim-ui gil lobuteo talseonke halyeohan jaga issna ni geuegeneun hyeonse-ui chiyog-i iss-eulgeos-imyeo simpan-ui nal-eneun geulo hayeo geum hwayeom-ui eungbeol-eul masboge halila
geugeos-eun ne du son-i naemin haeng wi ttaemun-eulo hananim-eun jongdeul-eul gyeol ko budanghage daehasiji ani hasi nola

salamdeul jung-eneun moseolieseo hananim-eul gyeongbaehamae joh-eun il-i iss eul ttaeneun manjoghae hadaga silyeon-i iss eul ttaeneun geudeul-ui anmyeon-eul deullyeobeoli mae geudeul-eun hyeonsewa naeseleul ilhgedoe ni igeos-eun myeongbaeghan sonsil-ila
geuleul haechijido anihago yu yonghagedo haji moshaneun hananim a nin daleun geos-eul sungbaehani geugeos-eun keodalan banghwang-ila
haeloum-i iloumboda deo manh eun geos-e uijihago issnani sillo sa aghan geos-i geuui chinguyo huwonjala
geuleona hananimkkeseoneun mid-eum-eulgajgo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eul cheongug-e deulgehanani geu mit-eneun mul-i heuleu doda sillo hananim-eun geubun-i wonha sineun daelo haenghasinila

hyeonsewa naeseeseodo geuege seungliga eobs-eulila saeng-gaghaneun jaga issdamyeon geulohayeo cheonjeong-e basjul eul ppeodchige handa-eum basjul-ui mog-eul jal la geuleul jilsigkehan hu geuui eummoga jagiui noyeoum-eul jegeohal su issneun ji jikyeobodolog hala
hananim-eun geugeos-eul bunmyeonghan ye jeung-eulo gyesihaessnani hananim-eun geubun i wonhaneun jaleul indohasinila

midneun jadeulgwa yudaeindeulgwa sabiiindeulgwa gidoggyoindeulgwa ma juseu-indeulgwa bulsinjadeul-i issnani sillo hananimkkeseoneun simpan-ui nal geu deul-eul bunlihanani hananimkkeseoneun mo deun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesim-ila

haneul-e issneun geosgwa ttang-e issneungeosgwa taeyang-gwa dalgwa byeoldeulgwa sandeulgwa namuwa dongmuldeulgwa manh-eun salamdeul-i hananimkke buboghayeo gyeongbaeham-eul neohui neun alji moshaneunyo manh-eun salamdeul-i beol-eul badge doeeossnani hananim-ui jeojuleul bad-eun ja eoneu nugudo geuleul myeong-yelobge haji moshanola sillo hananim eun wonhaneun daelo hasinila
junim-e daehayeo nonjaeng-eul haneun du muliga issnani bulsinhaneun jadeul eun bulgil-e os-i jjijgimyeo meoli wie neun igeuldaeneun mul-i bueojilila
geugeos-eulo inhayeo geudeul-ui nae jang-gwa pibudo nog-a naelil geos-ila
geu oeedo geudeul-eul beolhal cheollodoen hoecholiga issnani
geunsim-eulo malmiam-a geudeul-i geugeos-eulobuteo pihalyeo wonhana geudeul-eun dasi geu an-eulo doedollyeowa bul-uijingbeol-eul masbol geos-ila

geuleona hananimkkeseoneun mid-eum-eulgajgo seon-eul haenghaneun ideul-eun cheongug-e deulge hanani geu mit-eneun mul-i heuleunola geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jinjuwa hwang-geum-ui paljjilo jangsigdoego geu an-eseo geudeul-i ib-eul uisang-eun bidan-ila
geudeul-eun joh-eun malsseum-eulo indo doeeossgo chingsongbadneun gillo indodoeeossnola

mid-eum-eul bulsinhamyeonseo hananim-uigil-eul banghaehaneun jawa bangmunhalyeo on baegseong-eul wihayeo hananim-i se-un sa won-e ganeun geos-eul banghaehaneun jawa geu an-eseo sinseongham-eul bulgyeolke haneun janeun geudeullo hayeogeum gotong-ui jingbeol eul masboge halila

hananim-i abeulaham-eul sinjeon-eulo indohamyeonseo eoneu mueosdo naege bulsinhaji malmyeo sunlyehaneun jawa gi dohaneun jawa heoli gubulyeo yebae haneun jaleul wihae naui jib-eul sinseongke haessnola
geuleona geugos-eulo sunlyehadologsalamdeul-ege allyeola geudeul-eun geol-eo seo ttoneun nagtaleul tago meon gos-eulo buteo neoege olila

geudeul-eun yuyongham-eul moggyeoghal geos imyeo gyujeongdoen nal dong-an-e geubun-i bepun gachugdeul-e daehayeo hananim-ui ileum-eulo chanmihal geos-ini neohuido meoggo gananhamyeo gungpibhan ja-egedo bepulla
geuleon hu geudeullo hayeogeum uisig-eul wanseongke hago geudeul-ui gyeolsim-eul ihaengke hamyeo dasi olaedoen jib-eul sunlyehadolog hala

geugeos-i balo sunlyela hananim-ui uisig-eul haenghaneun janeun hananim gyeot e geuleul wihan bog-i iss-eumyeo neohuileul wihayeoneun gachug-i heoyongdoenola geuleo na neohuiege eongeubhan geos-eun je-oedoe nani usang-ui bulgyeolhamgwa wiseon-ui mal deul-eul pihala

daleun geos-eul sungbaehaji aniha go hananimman-eul gyeongbaehaneun olbaleun mid-eum-eul gajila hananim-eul bulsinhaneun ja geuneun machi haneul nop-eun gos-eseo tteol-eojini saedeul-i geuleul meog-eobeoligeo na balam-i geuleul meongos-eulo nallyeobo naen geosgwa gatdeola
geugeos-eun hananim-i sangjing-eul myeong-yelobge haneun geos-eulo geugeos-iyamal lo gyeong-geonhan ma-eum-ui sosan-ila
geu an-eneun jeonghayeojin gigankka ji neohuiege yuyongham-i iss-eumyeo hui saengje-ui jangsoneun yes jib-ila

hananim-eun salamdeul-ege uisig-eulhaenghadolog hayeoss-euni ineun gachug-eul geudeul-ege il-yonghal yangsig-eulo jusin hananim-eul yeong-wonke hagoja ham-ila neohuiui sin-eun hanbun-isini geubun-ege sunjonghago gyeomsonhan jadeul-ege bog-eum-eul jeonhala

ideul-eun hananim-eul yeom-wonhal ttae ma-eum-e dulyeoum-eul gajneun jadeul-imyeo eolyeoum-e innaehaneun jadeul-imyeo yebae leul haenghaneun jadeul-imyeo hananim-i geu deul-ege jun yangsig-eulo bepuneun jadeul ila

hananim-i geubun-ui sangjing-eulo neohuiege bonaejun nagtadeul-eun neohui leul wihae yuyongham-i manh-eunila geuleo meulo dosalhal ttae hananim-ui ileum-eul yeom-wonhago ttang-e neom-eojil ttae huisaengdoen gogileul meogdoe gananhan jawa bul-uhan ja-ege bunbaehayeo jula ileohge geu bun-eun geugeos-i neohuiege sunjonghado log hayeoss-euni neohuineun gamsahaeya ha nola

gogiwa pineun hananimkke ileu ji anihana neohuiui gyeong-geonham-eun geu bun-ege ileunila geuleohge hayeo geubunkkeseo geugeosdeullo hayeogeum neohuiege sunjongke ham-eun neohuileul indohan hananim-eul yeong-gwangdoege ham-ini seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bog-eum-eul jeonhala
hananim-eun mid-eum-eul gajinjadeul-eul bohohasina baesinhamyeo eunhyeleul moleu neun janeun salanghaji ani hasinola
chimlyaghaneun jadeul-e daehanghayeo tujaenghaneun geos-i neohuiege heolagdoena ni modeun jalmos-eun chimlyagjadeul-ege iss nola hananim-eun jeonjijeonneunghasa neohui ege seunglileul jusinila

uliui junim-eun ojig hananim ppun-ilago malhan geos hanalo budangha ge gohyang-eulobuteo chubangdanghan ideul-i issnola man-il hananim-ui bohoga eobs-eossdeolamyeon bulsinjadeul-i jibaehan su dowondo gyohoedeuldo yudaegyo hoedang deuldo hananim-eul yeom-wonhaneun sawondeul do pagoedoeeoss-eul geos-ila sillo hana nim-eun geubun-ui jong-gyoe gat-i haneun ja leul seunglihage hasini hananim-eun gang hasimgwa neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasim-ila
ideul-ilan hananim-i jisang-e geojukehan geudeullo geudeul-eun yebaeleul haenghago iseullamseleul naemyeo seon-eul haeng hamyeo ag-eul meollihani mansaui gyeolgwa neun hananimkke dallyeo issnola
geudeul-i geudaeleul geoyeoghan geos-eun cheoeum-i anila geudeul ijeon-ui noa ui baegseongdo geulaess-eumyeo adeuwa samu deu baegseongdo geulaessnola
abeulahamgwa los baegseongdo geulaess nola
median-ui baegseongdeuldo geuleohayeoss eumyeo mosedo baeban danghaessnola naega bulsinjadeul-eul jamsi yuyehadaga beol-eul jueossnani geudeul-e daehan naui beol-eun eolmana museowossdeonyo
hananim-i eolmana manh-eun bulsin ui go-euldeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossneunyo jibungdeul-i muneojigo umuldeul-i memaleugo nop-i sos-eun gungjeondeul-i pagoedoeeossnola

geudeul-eun ma-eumgwa gwilosseo jihye leul deudgo baeugi wihae jisang-eul yeohaenghaji ani haessdeonyo sillo jangnim-i doen geos-eun geudeul-ui nundeul-i anila geudeul gaseumsog-e issneun ma-eumdeul-ila

geudeul-i geudaeege beol-eul seodulleo boila jaechoghana hananim-eun geu bun-ui yagsog-eul wibanhaji ani hasi nila sillo geudae junim gyeot-eseoui haluneun neohuideul gyesan-euloneun cheonnyeon gat eunila
joemanh-eun go-eul-eul jamsi yuyeha daga beolhayeoss-euni naegelo dol-aodeola
illeogalodoe salamdeul-iyeo sillonaneun neohuileul wihan bunmyeonghan gyeong-goja e bulgwahanola
mid-eum-i iss-eo seon-eul haenghaneun geudeul-ege gwan-yong-gwa pungseonghan yangsig-i iss eulila
geuleona hananim-ui gyesileul jwa jeolkoja haneun geudeul-eun buljiog-ui dong banjadeul-i doelila

hananim-i geudae ijeon-e seonji jana yeeonjaleul bonaess-eul ttaemada sa tan-eun geuui yogmang-e yuhog-eul deonjyeoss-eu doe hananim-eun satan-i deonjin yuhogdeul eul jegeohasin hu geubun-ui malsseum-eul hwaglibhasini hananim-eun asimgwa jihyelochungmanhasim-ila
geuleohge hayeo geubunkkeseoneun ma eum-i byeongdeulgo gud-eobeolin jadeul-eul sa tan-i deonjin yuhog-eulo siheomhasini sillo joejieun jadeul-eun jinlieseo meol li tteol-eojyeo issnola

jisig-eul buyeobad-eun jadeul-eun geu geos-i geudae junim-eulobuteo gyesidoen jinliim-eul alge doelila geulihayeo geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun geugeos-e sunjonghadeolahananim-eun midneun jadeul-eul olbaleun gil lo indohasineun bun-isigi ttaemun-ila
geuleona mid-eum-eul baebanhaneun ja deul-eun geugeos-e gwanhayeo simpan-ui nal-i ogo jaeang-ui nal jingbeol-i geudeul-ege ol ttaekkaji gyesoghayeo uisimhanola
geunal-ui gwonneung-eun hananimkke iss eo geubunkkeseo geudeul-eul simpanhasini mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eun hwan huiui cheongug-e issge doenola
geuleona mid-eum-eul bulsinhago hana nim-ui malsseum-eul bujeonghaneunja geudeul-ege neun gul-yog-ui jingbeol-i iss-eulila

hananim-ui gil-eul ttala ijuhageo na salhaedanghageona saengmyeong-eul bachin geudeul ege hananimkkeseoneun hullyunghan yangsig-eul jusinani sillo hananim-eun gajang hullyung hasin yangsig-ui gong-geubja isila
geubun-eun geudeul-i gippeohaneun cheon gug-eulo deulge hani sillo hananim-eun jihyewa eunhyelo chungmanhasim-ila

geuleohasim-ila silyeon-eul danghago baghaeleul bad-assdeon geosgwa gat-eun geos isang eulo bobog-eul haji anhneun jaleul hana nim-eun dousinani sillo hananim-eun jabiwa gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasim-ila
geuleohan geos-eun hananimkkeseo bam eul naj-eulo hasigo naj-eul bam-eulo ha sil su issgi ttaemun-eulo hananim-eunmodeun geos-eul deudgo bosigi ttaemun-ila
hananim-eun jinliisini geubun oee geudeul-i guwonhaneun geos-eun danji heosdoen heowie bulgwahanola sillo ha nanim-eun gajang nopgo widaehasidoda
hananimkkeseo haneullobuteo bileulnaelige hayeo daejiga chowon-i doedo log hasim-eul neohuineun boji moshaessneunyo sillo hananim-eun seomsehasigo asineunbun-isila
haneulgwa daejiwie issneun modeun geos-i geubun-ege issnani sillo hana nim-eun pung-yolobge yeong-gwang-eul bad-eusil bun isila

hananimkkeseo daejiwiui modeun geosgwa geubun-ui myeonglyeong-eulo badaleul da nineun baedeullo hayeogeum neohuiege bog jongke hasyeoss-eum-eul neohuineun alji mosha neunyo geubun-ui heolag eobs-ineun biga ttang-e naeliji moshadolog hasieossnola sillo hananim-eun salamdeul-ege chinjeolhasigo jabilousinila
saengmyeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a ganeun geosdo ttohan yeongsaeng-eul jusimdo geubun-isigeoneul sillo ingan-eun eunhyeleul mang-gaghan jadeul-ila

hananim-eun gag baegseong-ege geudeul-i suhaenghage doel gyeongbae uisig-eul jueossnola i il-e gwanhayeo geudeul-i geudaewa nonjaengchi anhdolog hala geudae junimkkae gidohala geudaeya mallo olh-eun pyeon-e issnola
geudeul-i geudaeege nonjaeng-eul han damyeon illeo galodoe neohuiga haenghago issneun modeun geosdeul-eul hananimkkeseoneun asinola
hananimkkeseoneun neohuiga nonjaenghangeos-e daehayeo simpan-ui nal neohuileul jaepanhasinola
haneulgwa ttangsog-e issneun geos-eul ha nanimkkeseo algo gyesim-eul neohuineun moleuneunyo geugeos-eun chaegsog-e iss-euni sillo geugeos-eun hananimkkeneun swiun il-ila
geudeul-eun geubunkkeseo gwonhan-eul nae lisiji anihan hananim anin geos tto neun jihyedo eobsneun usang-eul sungbaehago iss-eul ppun-ila ideul umaehan jadeul-e geneun guwonjaga eobsnola

hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege nangsongdoeeojyeoss-eul ttae geudaeneun bulsinja deul-ui eolgul-eseo silh-eoham-eul alge doe eossdoda geudeul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-i nangsongdoen geudeul-eul gong-gyeoghalyeo hadoda illeogalodoe naega igeosboda deo na ppeun geos-eul neohuiege gyeong-gohanani bul sinhaneun jadeul-eul wihae hananimkkeseo malyeonhan geos-eun jiogppun-ini jeojuseuleoun unmyeong-i doelila

salamdeul-iyeo hanaui biyuleul deusa geugeos-e gwileul giul-ila hana nim anin daleun geos-e guwonhaneun jadeul-eun geudeul-i on him-eul da mo-eunda hae do gyeolko pali hanmali jochado changjohaji moshamyeo geu paliga geudeullobu teo mueos-ingaleul gajyeogandahaedo geudeul-eun geugeos-eulo buteo geugeos-eul guhaji moshani sungbaejaga usang-eun heoyaghal ppun-ila
geudeul-eun hananim-ui jinlileul pyeong gahaji moshanani ineun hananimkkeseotteushasineun daelo suhaenghaneun gwonhangwa neunglyeog-i iss-eusigi ttaemun-ila
hananim-eun cheonsadeulgwa salamdeul jung-eseo seonjijadeul-eul seontaeghasyeoss-euni sillo hananim-eun deul-eusigo jikyeobogo gyesinola
geubun-eun geudeul ijeon-e iss-eossdeon geosgwa geudeul hue iss-eul geos-eul algo gyesini modeun geos-i hananimkkelo dol aganola
midneunjadeul-iyeo heolisug-yeo bubog hago junim-eul gyeongbaehamyeo seon-eul haengha la geulihamyeon neohuiga beonseonghalila

hananim-ui gil-eseo seongjeonhala geu seongjeon-eun geubun-ui gwonlila geubunkke seo neohuileul seontaeghasa jong-gyosaenghwal-e eolyeoum-i eobsdolog haessnola geuleom-eulo neohuiui seonjo abeulaham-ui sin-ang-eul ttaleula geubun-eun jeon-edo geuligo o neulnal-edo neohuileul museulling-ila bu leusyeoss-eumyeo geu seonjijaga neohuie-ui jung-in-i doego neohuineun baegseongdeul-ege jung-in-i doelini yebaeleul deuligo i seullamseleul bachila geuligo hananim-eul ttaleula geubun-eun bohohamgwa dowa jusim-i gajang eutteumgasin bohoja isila
midneun salamdeul-eun beonseonghanani
ideul-eun yebaee imhayeo gyeomsonhaneun jadeul-imyeo
heosdoen mal-eul haji anhneun jadeul-i myeo
iseullamseleul bachineun jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-ila
geuleona anaewa oleun son-i so yuhaneun geosdeul-eun je-oedoeeo namulal dega eobsnola
geuleona geu hangyeleul neom-eo yogmang eul gajin ja sillo geudeul-eun joeindeul ila
geudeul-ui sin-yong-eul jikigo gyeyag-eul junsuhaneun jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui yebaeleul chungsilhi jikineunjadeul-ini
ideul-i sangsog-indeul-i doeeo
cheongug-eul sangsogbad-a geu an-eseo yeongsaenghalila
sillo hananim-eun ingan-eul heulg-eu lo bich-eun da-eum
geuleul hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulosseo anjeongdoen gos-e dueoss-eumyeo

geuleon da-eum geu jeong-aeg-eul eunghyeol sikigo geu eunghyeollosseo sal-eul mandeulgo geu sallosseo ppyeoleul mandeul-eoss-eumyeo sallo sseo geu ppyeoleul gamssage han hu daleun geos eul mandeul-eossnani gajang heullyunghasin ha nanimkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo
geuleon hu neohui moduga imjong ke hani
simpan-ui nal neohui moduga buhwalhanola
hananim-eun neohui meoliwie chil cheon-eul mandeul-eoss-euni geubun-eun changjoha neunde gyeolko mugwansimhaji anhnola
hananim-eun haneullobuteo jeogdanghan-yang-ui bileul naelige hayeo ttang sog-e jeojanghadaga geugeos-eul dasi geodueo ganola
geugeos-eulo hananim-eun neohuileul wihae jonglyeonamuwa podoga yeollineun jeong-won-eul dueossnola geu an-e gwaildeul i pungbuhani neohuiga geu jung-eseo meog eula
sinai san-eseo namuleul ja lage hayeo igeos-eulo ollibeu gileum gwa sig-yong yangnyeom-eul saengsanke hayeossnola

gichug-edo neohuileul wihan gyohun eul dueossnani geuui mom-an-e issneun geos eulo hananim-i neohuiege masilgeos-eul junola neohuiga geu an-eseo yuighan geos-eul manh-i eodgo tto geugeos-eul gogilo seobchwihanola
neohuineun gachuggwa baeleul tanola
hananim-i noaleul geuui baegseong ege bonaeni geuga malhagil baegseongdeul iyeo hananim-eul gyeongbaehala geubun oe eneun sin-i eobsnani neohuineun dulyeobji anhneunyo

ittae geuui baegseong-gaunde bulsin jadeul-ui udumeoliga malhagil i sa lam-eun neohuiwa ttoggat-eun ingan-euloseo neohui wie gunlimhalyeo haneun jala man il hananimkkeseo tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon cheon sadeul-eul naelyeobonaess-eul geos-ila uli neun uli seonjodeul gaundeseodo ileon geos-eul deul-eoboji moshaessnola
sillo ineun michinja-e bulgwaha ni jamsidong-an gidalyeo bola hadeola
ie geuga malhagil juyeo geu deul-i jeoleul bujeonghaneun geos-e daehayeo jeolo hayeogeum seunglike hayeo jusoseo

geulihayeo hananim-eun geulo ha yeo uliga boneun ap-eseo uliui gyesie ttala bangjuleul mandeulla hayeoss-eu myeo uliui myeonglyeong-eulo gyegog-i mullo neomchini gag jonglyuui han ssang-gwa neoui gajog-eul taeulaneun malsseum-i iss-eossnolageuleona geojeolhan jadeul-eun je-oela joe jieun jadeul-eul wihae naege guwonhaji malla geudeul-eun igsahal geos-ila
neowa geuligo neowa hamkke han jaga baeleul tamyeonseo joejieun baegseongdeullobuteo jeohuileul guwonhayeo jusin hananimkkemodeun yeong-gwang-eul deulilago malhala
juyeo chugbogbad-eun ttang-e ileuge hayeo jusoseo dangsin-iyamallo geuleoh ge hal su issneun gajang hullyunghan bun-i siobnida
sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss-eoss eumyeo ulineun i malsseum-eulo geudeul-eulsiheomhaessnola
geu huedo hananim-eun geudeul i hu tto daleun sedaeleul sewossnola
geudeul gaondee han yeeonjaleul bonaeeoss-euni ineun neohuiga hanbun bakk e eobsneun hananim-eul gyeongbaetolog ham-i la neohuineun dulyeobji anhneunyo

hyeonseeseo hananim-ui eunhyeleul bad-eun geu baegseong-ui jogjangdeul-eun mid-eum-eul bulsinhago naese-ui sangbong-eul bujeonghamyeo malhagil i salam-eun neohuiwa machanga jilo han ingan-e bulgwahani neohuiga meogneun geoscheoleom geudo meoggo neohuiga ma sineun geoscheoleom geudo masineun ingan-il ppun-ila
man-il neohuiwa daleulba eobsneun han ingan-ege bogjonghandamyeon neohuineun bunmyeong ilh-eunjadeul-i doelila hadeola
neohuiga jug-eo heulg-idoego ppyeoman nam-eul ttae neohuiga dasi sosaenghal geos-ila geuga yagsoghayeossdeonyo
neohuiga yagsogbad-eun geos-eun bulga neunghan geos-ila
sillo hyeonse-ui salm oeeneun amuleon saengmyeong-i eobsnola uliga jug-eo dasi sal-a buhwalhandaneun geos-eun bulganeung han il-ila
sillo geuneun hananim-e daehayeo geojishaneun han sanaee bulgwahageoneul ulineun geuleul mid-eul su eobsdoda
ittae yeeonjakkeseo juyeo jeoleul dowajusoseo geudeul-eun jeoleul bujeonghanaida lago giwonhanani
hananimkkeseo daedabhasa geudeul-eungod nwiuchige doelila
geuhu geudeul-ege jeogjeolhan beol-i naelyeojyeoss-euni hananim-eun geudeul-eul jug-eunnag-yeob-eulo mandeul-eo geu joejieun jadeul eul myeolmangke haessnola
geuleon da-eum hananim-eun geudeul ihuui daleun sedaeleul sewossnola
eoneu baegseongdeuldo geudeul-ui unmyeong eul jaechoghal su eobsgo ttohan yuyehal su eobsnola

hananim-eun chalyelo seonjijadeul-eulbonaessnola seonjijaga go-eul-e ileul ttaemaga geudeul-eun geuleul bujeonghayeossdeola geulihayeo ulineun geudeul-eul chalyedaelo myeolmangsikyeo geudeul-eul dansunhan iyagigeo lilo mandeul-eossnola midji anhneun jadeul eun icheoleom myeolmanghanila
geuhu hananim-eun mosewa geuui hyeongje alon-eul malsseumgwa yejeung-eulo bo naessnola
palaowa geuui udumeoliege do bonaess-euna geudeul-eun omanhan baegseong eulo geoman-eul piwossnola
geudeul-i malhagil uliwa daleul ba eobsneun du ingan-eul mid-eoya haneu nyo geu du ingan-ui baegseongdeul-eun uli ui jongbogdeul-i anideonyo
ileohdeus du yeeonjaleul bulsinha yeoss-euni geudeul-eun myeolmanghanja gaunde iss-eossnola
hananim-eun moseege seongseoleul jueo ilo geudeul-i indobaddolog ha yeossnola
hananim-eun maliaui adeulgwa geuui eomeonileul hanaui yejeung-eulo hago nop-eun gos-eul geudeul-ege ansigcheo lo jegonghani geugos-eneun mogchowa saem i issdeola
seonjijadeul-iyeo heolagdoen joh-eun geosdeul-eul seobchwihadoe seon-eul haenghala neo huiga haenghaneun ildeul-eul naega algo issnola
sillo neohuiui gongdongcheneun hana imyeo naega neohuiui junim-igeoneul hang sang naleul dulyeowohala
geuleona baegseongdeul-eun hanaui jong gyoeseo yeoleo jongpalo bun-yeolhan hu gagjongpa-e manjoghago issnola
geuleona jamsidong-an geudeul-eul heun lanhan mujisangtaelo dula
hananim-i geudeul-ege jaesangwa jason-eul julila geudeul-eun saeng-gaghaneu nyo
hananim-i geudeul-eul wihae seodul leo seon-eul haenghago issdago saeng-gaghana geuleohji anhnola geudeul-i moleul ppun-i la
sillo junim-eul dulyeowo hamyeo saenghwalhago
junim-ui jingpyoleul hwagjeunghamyeo
junim oee daleun geos-eul seomgijianhgo
junimkkelo dol-agal geos-eul dulyeo wohamyeo ma-eum-eulo jaseon-eul bepunja issnani
ideul-eun seodulleo seon-eul haenghamyeo apjangseo silcheonhanola
hananim-eun neunglyeog isang-eulo mu geoun jim-eul juji anihamyeo jinlileul boyeojuneun gilog-eul gajigo iss-euni geudeul-eun gyeolko bulgongpyeonghan daejeob-eul bad ji anhnola
geuleona geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun igeos eul jeonhyeo yeomdue duji anh-eumyeo hon dongwa geu bakk-ui daleun haeng-wileul gyesog hani
an-ihage sal-aganeun geudeul-ege beol-eul naelyeossnola ittae geudeul-eun aewon hadeola
oneul-e ileuleo aewonhaji mal la malsseum-i iss-euljini neohuineun bunmyeong hananim-ui guwon-eul badji moshalila
naui malsseum-i neohuiege nangsong doel ttaemada neohuineun dol-aboji ani haessdeola
geugeos-e gwanhan mujihan maldeul-eun bam-e uhwaleul yaegihaneun geosgwa gat-eun geos-eulo
geudeul-eun wae hananim-ui malsseum-eul suggohaji ani haneunyo geudeul seonjo deul-ege eobs-eossdeon geos-i geudeul-ege wass dago saeng-gaghaneunyo
animyeon geudeul-i geudeul-ui seonji jaleul alji moshayeo geuleul bujeonghalyeo haneunyo
animyeon geuga michin salam-ila go maldeul haneunyo geuleona geubun-eun geu deul-ege jinlileul gajigo wass-euna geudeuldaebubun-i geu jinlileul silh-eohadeola

amado geu jinliga geudeul-ui yogmang-eul ttalassdamyeon haneulgwa ttang-gwa geu ligo geu an-e issneun modeun geos-i mu jilseosog-e iss-eoss-eulila hananim-i geudeul-ege gyohun-eul bonaessneundedo geudeul eun geu gyohun-e deung-eul dollideola
neohuineun geudeul-ege eotteon bosang eul yoguhaneunyo junim-ui bosang-i ga jang joh-eun geos-eulo geubun-eun gajang hullyunghan suyeojaisila
sillo geudaega geudeul-eul olh-eun gillo indohago iss-euna
naeseleul midji anihan jadeul-eun geu gillobuteo talseonhago iss-euni
man-il hananim-i geudeul-ege ja bileul bepul-eo geudeul-ui gotong-eul jegeo hayeo jundahadeolado geudeul-eun joeag-eul deohayeo banghwanghage doelila
hananim-i geudeul-eul beolhayeossneun dedo geudeul-eun junimkkae gyeomsonchi ani hago gancheonghaji anhdeola
hananim-i geudeul-ege gahoghan beol-ui mun-eul yeol ttaee bola geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jeolmanghage doelila
geubunkkeseo neohuiege cheong-gaggwa sigaggwa choggag-eul jusyeossgeonman neohuineun gamsahaneunde insaeghadoda
neohuileul jisang-e beonsigke hasin bun-i geubun-isini neohuineun geubunkkelo jibhabdoelila
saengmyeong-eul jusigo as-agasineun bundo geubun-isimyeo najgwa bam-eul dalli hayeo jusineun bundo geubun-isigeoneul neohuineun alji moshaneunyo
geuleona geudeul-eun seonjodeul-i mal han geosgwa daleul ba eobs-euni
uliga jug-eo heulg-gwa ppyeoga doeeoss eul ttae dasi buhwaldoel su issneunyo la go geudeul-i malhadoda
ileohan il-eun uliege geuli go uli seonjodeul-egedo yagsogdoeeossji man sillo igeos-eun yes yaegie bulgwaha da malhani
illeogalodoe daejiwa geu an-e issneun modeun geos-i nuguege soghayeo issneunyo neohuiga man-il algo issdamyeon malhala
geudeul-eun malhalila hananimkke gwisoghayeo issdoda illeogalodoe geulaedo neohuineun gyohun-eul sulaghaji anhneunyo
illeogalodoe chilcheon-ui ju-in-eun nugu-imyeo gwonjaui ju-in-eun nugunyago hal ttae
hananimkkae gwisogdoeeo issdoda lago geudeul-i malhalini illeogalodoeneohuineun geulaedo dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
illeogalodoe modeun geos-eul jugwan hasineun bun-i nugusinyo tto modeun geos-eul bohohasina bohobadji anihan bun-eun nugusinyo man-il neohuideul-i a neun jadeul-ilamyeon malhala hani
hananim isila geudeul-i malha lini illeogalodoe geuleomyeon eojjihayeoneohuineun hyeonhogdoego issneunyo
hananim-i geudeul-ege jinlileul jueossgeonman sillo geudeul-eun geojis-eul mal haneun jadeul-ila

hananim-eun jasig-eul duji ani hasyeoss-eumyeo geubun-eul daejeoghal eotteohan sindo eobsnola man-il daleun manh-eun sindeul-i iss-eossdamyeon gag sindeul-eun jagiga changjohan geos-eul ppaeas-a gass-eul geos-imyeo daleun sin-eul jibaehaess-eulila hananim-iyeogeudeul-i myosahaneun geos-eul chowolhayeo hollo yeong-gwangbad-eusoseo
geubun-eun boiji anhneun geosgwa boineun geosdo da asineun bun-isini geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-i biyuhalyeoneun geos wie gyesinila
illeogalodoe juyeo jeolo hayeo geum geudeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-eul boisi lyeomyeon
juyeo jeoleul joejieun baegseong-gaun de duji maobsoseo
sillo hananim-eun geubun-i geudeul ege yagsoghan geos-eul geudaeege boyeo jul su issnola
seonhaeng-eulo ag-eul jjoch-eula hana nim-eun geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eul algo issnola
illeogalodoe juyeo salamdeul-ui yuhog-eulobuteo dangsinkke boholeul guha naida
geudeul-i je ap-e natanaji anhdolog dangsinkke boholeul guhanaida
jug-eum-i geudeul-ege ileul ttae ju yeo jeoleul dasi dollyeobonae jusoseo

jega namgyeodun yeosaeng dong-an seon eul haenghal su issnaida lago malhana geuleona gyeolko hal su eobsnani geugeos-eun geuga jikkeol-ineun mal-e bulgwahamyeo geu deul ap-eneun buhwalhaneun geunalkkaji jang byeog-i iss-eul ppun-ila
geunal napal-i bulliumyeon geudeulsaie deo isang-ui yudae gwangyega eobs eojimyeo seologa mudjido ani hanola
geuttae geuui seonhaeng-i manh-assdeon jadeul-eun beonseonghal geos-imyeo
geuui jeoul-i gabyeoun jadeul-eungeudeul-ui yeongheun-eul ilhgo jiog-eseo yeong wonhi sanola
bul-i geudeul-ui eolgul-eul taeunigeudeul-eun geu an-eseo gotong-eul masbodeo la
naui malsseum-i neohuiege nang songdoeji ani hayeossneunyo neohuineun geu geos-eul bujeonghayeossnola
ittae geudeul-i malhalini juyeobulhaeng-i jeohuileul deopchinaida jeohuineun banghwanghaneun baegseong-ieossseubnida
juyeo geugeos-eulobuteo jeohuileul guhayeo jusoseo jeohuiga dasi joeag eul banboghandamyeon sillo jeohuiga joein deul-iobnida lago hani
geubunkkeseo malsseum-i issnola geuan-eulo deul-eogala geuligo naege mal haji malla
juyeo midnani jeohuileul yongseohayeo jusigo jabileul bepul-eo juobso seo dangsin-iyamallo gajang hullyunghan ja bileul bepusin bun-isibnida lago mal haneun muliga naui jongdeul gaunde iss-eossdeola
geuleona neohuideul-eun geudeul-eul jolonghayeo geugeos-eulo neohuiga naleul yeom-wonhaneun geos-eul mang-gagke haess-eumyeo geuttae neohuiga geudeul-eul biusgo iss-eossnola
sillo naneun oneul geudeul-i in naehan geos-eulo bosang-eul hanani geudeul i seunglijadeul-ila
geubunkkeseo neohuineun myeochhae dong-anjisang-e chelyuhayeossneunyo lago malsseumha sini
halu animyeon haluui ilbubun-e jinaji anhseubnida sem-eul gyesanha neun ja-ege mul-eobosibsiyo lago geu deul-eun daedabhadeola
neohuiga algo issdamyeon sillo neohuineun jamsi chelyuhan geos-e bulgwaha daneun geubun-ui malsseum-i eoss-eossnola
hananim-i neohuileul jangnan-eulo changjohayeossda saeng-gaghayeossneunyo sillo neo huineun geubun-egelo dol-aganila
jinliui wang-isin hananim-eul chan-yanghala geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo geubun-eun ogjwaui ju-in-isila
hananimgwa deobul-eo amuleon gwonhando eobsneun daleun sin-eul sungbaehaneunja junimkkeseo geuleul gyesanhasini sillo bulsinjadeul-eun beonseongchi moshalila
illeogalodoe juyeo yongseohayeo jusigo jabileul bepul-eo jusoseo dang sin-iyamallo eunhyeleul bepuneun gajang hullyunghan bun-isiobnida
igeos-eun hananim-i gyesihan yulbeob-eulo geuan-e jinliui malsseum-eul gyesi hayeossnani ilohayeo neohuiga gyohun-eul badge hagoja ham-ila

gantonghan yeojawa namja gaggag-ege neun baegdaeui gajugtaehyeong-ila neohuiga hananim-eul midgo naeseleul midneundamyeon hananimkke sunjonghadoe geudeul-ege dongjeong chi malmyeo midneun sindodeullo hayeogeum geu deul-e daehan hyeongbeol-eul ibjeungkehala

gantonghan namjaneun gantonghan yeoja ttoneun sin-eul midji anihan yeoja oee neun gyeolhonhal su eobs-eumyeo gantonghan yeoja neun gantonghan namja ttoneun sin-eul midji anihan namja oeeneun gyeolhonhal su eobs nani igeos-eun midneun sindodeul-ege geum jidoeeo issnola

sungyeolhan yeoseongdeul-eul jungsanghaneunja deul-i nemyeong-ui jeung-in-eul naese-uji mos hal gyeong-u geudeul-ege yeodeundaeui gajug hyeong-eul gahadoe geudeul-ui jeung-eondo sulag haeseoneun ani doenani ideul-eun saag han joein deul-ila
geuleona hoegaehago gaeseonhaneun ja deul-eun je-oeigeoneul sillo hananim-eun neogeuleousigo jabilousinila

jagiui bu-indeul-eul jungsanghamyeonseo jasindeul oeeneun eotteon jung-indo eobs-i dandog-eulo jeung-eonhal gyeong-u hananimkke maengsekehayeo jagiui mal-i sasil-ila neun geos-eul nebeon jung-eonke hala
daseosbeon-ui maengseeseo man-il geudeul i geojismal-eul handamyeon geudeul seuseulo-ege hananim-ui jeojuga iss-eul geos-ila
geuleona geunyeoga hananimkke geu namjaui geojisjung-eon-eul nebeon jung-eonhamyeon geunyeoege-ui beol-i myeonjedoemyeo
daseosbeonjjaelo geunyeo nampyeon-ui jung-eon i jinsil-ilamyeon hananim-ui bunnoga geunyeoege iss-eul geos-ila
man-il hananim-ui eunchong-gwa eunhye ga eobs-eossdamyeon tto hananimkkeseo geunghyul hi yeogisigo hyeonmyeonghaji anihasyeossda myeon neohuineun paemanghaess-eulila

sillo jungsang-eul peotteulin muliga neohui gaunde iss-eoss-eudoe geugeos-eul neo huie daehan joeag-eulo saeng-gagji malgo ohilyeo neohuileul wihan seon-eulo saeng-gag hala modeun ingan-eun geuga joeag-eulo-eod-eun mankeum bosangdoemyeo geu gaunde-ui udumeolineun deo keun beol-eul bad-eulila

neohuiga geu pungmun-eul deul-eoss-eul ttaemidneun namjado midneun yeoseongdo seuseulo deo keun bog-i doeeoss-euni igeos-eun bunmyeong han heowila geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eul deud ji ani hayeossneunyo
wae geudeul-eun geugeos-eul ibjunghal nemyeong-ui jeung-in-eul se-uji moshaessneunyo geu deul-i jeung-indeul-eul se-uji moshaess-euni geudeul-eun hananim ap-eseo heowijadeul ila
man-il hyeonsewa naeseeseo neohui wie hananim-ui eunchong-gwa jabiga eobs eossdamyeon neohuiga jungsanghaessdeon geos-eulo inhayeo keun beol-eul masboass-eulila

bola neohuiga danji neohuiui hyeolosseoman geugeos-eul bad-adeul-igo aneunba eobs-i neohui ib-euloman yaegihamyeo tto han geugeos-eul gabyeoun geos-eulo saeng-gagha yeo beolina hananim ap-eseoneun jungdae han il-ila
neohuiga geugeos-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae uliga igeos-eul malhal gwonliga eobsna ida hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo igeos-eun keun geojis-ibnida lago malha ji anihaessneunyo
hananimkkeseo neohuiege hungyehasa jinsillo neohuiga midneunjalamyeon gyeol ko geuleonhaeng-wileul doepul-i haji malla
hananimkkeseo neohuiege yejungdeul-eul balghyeojusini hananim-eun asimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
midneunjadeul gaundee chumun-i peotteulyeojineun geos-eul joh-ahaneun jadeul-eun hyeonsewa naeseeseo gotongseuleoun beol-eul bad-eulini hananim-eun neohuiga alji moshaneun geosdo algo gyesinila
man-il geudaedeul wie hananim-ui eunchong-gwa jabiwa eunhyega eobs-eossdamyeon sillo geudeul-eun paemanghaess-eulila

midneunjadeul-iyeo satan-ui dwileul ttaleuji malla satan-ui dwileul ttaleuneun ja-ege satan-eun geulo hayeogeum hangsang joeaggwa bihaeng-eul beomhadolog hanila man-il neohui wie hananim-ui eunchong-gwa jabiga eobs-eossdamyeon neohui gaunde eo neu nugudo cheong-gyeolhal su eobs-eoss-eulila geuleona hananim-eun geubun-ui tteus-i iss neun jaleul cheong-gyeolke hasyeossnani hananim eun deul-eusimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila

eunhyewa bog-eul badneun jaga chincheoggwa pil-yohan jawa hananim-ui sa-eob-eul wihae jib-eul tteonan geudeul-ege jaseon-eul bepulji anihalyeo maengsehaneunja neohui gaunde eobsdolog hala geuligo geudeul lo hayeogeum gwan-yong-eul bepuldolog hala neohuineun hananimkkeseo neohuiege gwan-yong ol bepul-eo jul geos-eul wonhaji aniha neunyo sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabi lo chungman hasim-ila
sasil-eul alji moshago sungyeolhan yeoseongdeul-eul jungsanghaneun jadeul-eun hyeonsewa naeseeseo jeojuleul bad-eul geos-imyeo geu deul-egeneun keunakeun beol-i iss-eulila
